34 Ke Elihu kutungunuka ne kuandamuna, wamba ne:
2 “Umvuayi mêyi anyi, nuenu badi ne meji;Ntelejayi, nuenu badi bamanye malu a bungi.
3 Bualu ditshi didi diteta mêyiAnu mudi ludimi lulabula biakudia.
4 Tutshinkayi tshidi tshiakane buetu tuetu;Tuangatayi dipangadika munkatshi muetu dia tshidi tshimpe.
5 Bualu Yobo mmuambe ne: ‘Ndi mubinge,+Kadi Nzambi mmumpale kulumbuluisha kuakane.+
6 Nenshime bua tshidi dilumbuluishibua dianyi ne b
... 
uambila mukalenge ne: ‘Udi muntu tshianana,’Peshi kuambila bantu banene ne: ‘Nudi bantu babi’ anyi?+
19 Kudi Eu udi kayi uleja bakokeshi kansungansungaUdi kayi wanyisha babanji kupita bapele,+Bualu buonso buabu badi mudimu wa bianza biende.+
20 Badi mua kufua diakamue,+ munkatshi mua butuku;+Badi banyukuka bikole menemene ne bajimina;Nansha bena bukole badi bumbushibua, kadi ki nku bianza bia muntu to.+
21 Bualu mêsu a Nzambi adi pa njila ya muntu,+Ne Yeye udi umona bidia biamakasa bionso bidiye
...
ha diende anyi?Wewe ngudi ne bua kusungula, ki mmeme to.Nunku, ngambila malu audi mumanye bimpe.
34 Bantu badi ne dijingulula dia malu nebangambile,Muntu yonso wa meji udi unteleja,
35 ‘Yobo udi wakula kayi ne tshidiye mumanye,+Ne mêyi ende mmapangile busunguluji.’
36 Yobo atetshibue too ne ku ndekelu,Bualu malu adiye wandamuna adi anu bu a bantu babi!
37 Yeye udi usakidila buntomboji ku mpekatu wende;+Udi ututa bikashi ne dipetu dionso kumpala kuetuNe uvudija mêyi ende ubanda Nzambi mulelela!”+

Kakuena nzambi bu Yehowa

Disambila dia Davidi.
86 Inyika ditshi diebe, wewe Yehowa, ungandamune,Bualu ndi nkenga ne ndi mupele.+
2 Lama muoyo wanyi, bualu ndi muena lulamatu.+Pandisha muena mudimu webe udi ukueyemena,Bualu wewe udi Nzambi wanyi.+
3 Ndeja luse, Yehowa wanyi,
... 
bu yanyi ya dilomba diambuluisha.+
7 Ndi nkubila mu dituku dia dikenga dianyi,+Bualu wewe neungandamune.+
8 Yehowa wanyi, kakuena udi bu wewe munkatshi mua nzambi mikuabu,+Kakuena midimu mikuabu idi bu yebe to.+
9 Bisamba bionso biuvua mufukeNebilue kuinama kumpala kuebe wewe, Yehowa,+Nebipeshe dîna diebe butumbi.+
10 Bualu wewe udi munene ne udi wenza malu a kukema;+Udi Nzambi, wewe nkayebe.+
11 Yehowa wanyi, ndongesha malu a njila webe.+Nengendele mu bulelela buebe.+Vuija muoyo wanyi muoyo umu
...
ena tshikisu didi dikeba bua kuangata muoyo wanyi,Ne kabena bakunemeka to.+
15 Kadi wewe, Yehowa, udi Nzambi wa luse udi uditeka pa muaba wa bakuabu,Udi kayi ukuata tshiji lukasa, muwule tente ne dinanga dia lulamatu pamue ne lulamatu.+
16 Tangila kundi, undeje luse.+Pesha muena mudimu webe bukole buebe,+Ne pandisha muana wa balume wa mupika webe mukaji.
17 Ndeja tshimanyinu tshia buimpe buebe,Bua badi bankine batshimone, bafuishibue bundu.
Bualu wewe, Yehowa, udi muambuluishi wanyi ne munsambi.

1, 2. Mbamue bantu kayi bavua badie bulunda ne Yehowa?
MMUNTU kayi uutu musue kudia nende bulunda? Mmuntu uudi munange ne unudi numvuangana nende. Mmuntu udi ne bikadilu bimpe ne ngikadilu iudi wanyisha.
2 Yehowa utu usungula bamue bantu bua bikale balunda bende. Tshilejilu, Abalahama uvua umue wa ku balunda ba Yehowa. (Yeshaya 41:8; Yakobo 2:23) Yehowa uvua kabidi munange Davidi. Wakamba ne: Davidi uvua ‘muntu uvua usankisha muoyo wende.’ (Bienzedi 13:22) Muprofete Danyele uvua “muntu wa mushin
... 
upeta malongesha a bungi ku malu avua mafikile Yobo. Lelu, Satana udi utubanda mutudi tuenzela Yehowa mudimu bua bintu bitudi mua kupetela kudiye. Mu Yobo 2:4, Satana udi wamba ne: “Muntu neafile bionso bidiye nabi bua muoyo wende.” Nanku Satana udi ubanda bantu bonso, balume ne bakaji, mudibu benzela Nzambi mudimu bua kupeta bintu, kadi ki nganu Yobo to. Bidimu nkama ya bungi Yobo mumane kufua, Satana utshivua anu upenda Yehowa ne ubanda batendeledi bende. Tshilejilu, tudi tubala mu Nsumuinu 27
...
muena dishima. Enzela Yehowa mudimu kabiyi bua difutu diudi muindile kumpala eku, kadi bualu udi mumunange ne muoyo mujima. Nunku neulue mulunda mulelela wa Nzambi!
^ tshik. 16 Bualu ebu kabuena bumvuija ne: Satana ke udi utuma bantu badi bakeba kukupangisha bua kulonga Bible to. Kadi Satana udi “nzambi wa ndongoluelu wa malu eu,” ne “ba pa buloba bonso badi ku bukokeshi [buende].” Nunku kabiena bitukemesha padi bantu bakeba kutupangisha bua kuenzela Yehowa mudimu to.—2 Kolinto 4:4; 1 Yone 5:19.

MULELA MU 1949
DITUNGA DIABU ÉTATS-UNIS
TSHIVUAYE UVUA UKEBA NSOMBELU WA NSONGO
TSHIMVUA KALE:
Mvua mukolele mu Ancram, tshimenga tshikese tshidi ku Nord kua New York mu États-Unis. Tshimenga etshi tshivua tshimanyike bikole bua dienza dia mabele. Bushuwa, bungi bua ngombe ivua mu tshimenga etshi buvua bupite bua bantu.
Bena mu dîku dietu bavua baya mu tshitanda tshimuepele tshivua mu tshimenga etshi. Mu Dia lumingu mu dinda, kaku muntu mulume uvua umfitshila buanga ku bisabata, ne pashishe mvua
... 
mina mu Bible wanyi meme muine. Mandamuna amvua katshia tshiyi muanji kupeta.
Malu angakalonga mu Bible akansankisha bikole menemene. Biakandenga bikole pangakabala 1 Yone 5:19 udi wamba ne: “Ba pa buloba bonso badi ku bukokeshi bua mubi.” Ngakumvua disulakana pangakamanya ne: Satana ke uvua ukebesha tunyinganyinga tuonso tutudi tumona pa buloba bujima, ne kumanya ne: Nzambi neajikije malu onso aa. (Buakabuluibua 21:3, 4) Ngakamanya kabidi ne: Bible udi umvuika padibu bamumvuija bimpe. Nansha mu
...
o isatu miela kudi muana wa bakaji mutekete.
^ tshik. 16 Mu kabujima, muana wa bakaji eu ne bana babu bakuabu bakambuluisha balongeshi babu batanu bua kulonga Bible ne kutendelela Yehowa.
^ tshik. 18 “Betele” udi umvuija ‘Nzubu wa Nzambi.’ Dîna edi ke didi Bantemu ba Yehowa babikila biro biabu bidi mu matunga mashilashilangane pa buloba bujima. (Genese 28:17, 19) Bena mu dîku dia Betele batu benza midimu mishilashilangane itu yambuluisha bua mudimu wa kulongesha wa Bantemu ba Yehowa uye kumpala.

Bible udi ne mukenji wa Nzambi, anyi dîyi diende buetu tuetu lelu. Udi utuleja tshitudi mua kuenza bua kuikala ne nsombelu muimpe ne tshia kuenza bua Nzambi kutuanyisha. Udi kabidi wandamuna nkonko idi ilonda eyi:
MUA KUPETA MVESE MU BIBLE
Bible mmuenza ne mikanda mikese 66. Mmukosolola mu bitupa bibidi: Mifundu ya mu tshiena Ebelu ne mu tshiena Alama (“Dipungila Dikulukulu”) ne Mifundu ya mu tshiena Greke (“Dipungila Dipiadipia”). Mukanda wonso wa mu Bible mmukosolola mu nshapita ne mvese. Padibu bafila mukanda wa kubala, nomba wa kumpala udi ulua panyima pa dîna dia mukanda udi uleja nshapita, ne nomba udi ulonda anyi idi ilonda idi ileja mvese. Tshilejilu: Genese 1:1 udi umvuija ne: Genese nshapita wa 1, mvese wa 1.

- Kinshasa : monusco udi ubenda menji adi bantu bamba ne ditunga dia congo didi mu njila wa dimukosolola . bivua mu muyuki muenza lelu ne ba kamona kamba mu tshimenga tshia kinshasa. Uleja bukola bonsu budi majinda a ditunga enza ne diambuluisha día monusco bua kubueja ditalala ku esta wa Congo .
- Bunia: Mu Ituri, ba mpulushi ba 6 ba ditunga bavua bashipa mu butuku bua kutshia lelu wa disatu ku Irumu-centre, pa km 55 kuinshi kua Bunia mu Territoire udi ne dina dimua .
- Kindu:Mu province wa Maniema, muepiscopo wa ntenji wa kasongo udi wangata kuinshi kua Maniema ne tshitupa tshimua tshia Sud-Kivu, udi wela patoka dipanga dikubibua mu tshitupa etshi .
- Kinshasa: Bukalenga bua ditunga dia canada budi buambuluisha ditunga dia congo ne matuka matua ku million 56 ya ndola . Makuta adi bua kutua mpanda malu a bisalu ne diondopa disama dia ebola .
- Kinshasa: Balongi bavua basombela miaba ya bukoya mu home wa université wa Kinshasa. Miaku ya ministre wa tulasa tua bifulu bia mabue kunyima kua dibandila uviversite wa kinshasa.
- Kisangani : Balongeshi bonsu bapia bapia anyi Nouvelles Unités ne batuadija kubafuta mu ngondu udi ulua pikala bu bajikija dibajadika .

Bilondolola Bible
Bible katelelepo patōkelela banyema betwa bu dinosaures. Inoko Bible unena’mba Leza “wapangile bintu byonso,” o mwanda i bimweke patōka’mba bano banyema nabo babadilwa mu bintu byapangile. a (Kusokwelwa 4:11) Nansha Bible byakatelelepo banyema betwa bu dinosaures patōkelela, inoko wisambila pa bibumbo bya bipangwa mobakokeja kubadilwa:
“Bipangwa bikatampe bya lui” nansha “bibanyema.”—Ngalwilo 1:21.
“Byonso bilandala pa nshi.”—Ngalwilo 1:25.
“Banyema ba ntanda ba pano panshi.”—N
... 
wa kya Ñimbo ya Mitōto 146:6 kitela Leza bu “Mulongi wa diulu ne ntanda, dijiba, ne byonso bidi’mo.”
Le banyema betwa bu dinosaures bāikele’ko kitatyi’ka?
Bible unena’mba banyema ba mu mema ne ba pa ntanda bāpangilwe mu difuku dya butano ne dya busamba, nansha bitatyi bya bupangi. b (Ngalwilo 1:20-25, 31) Mu uno muswelo, Bible witulengeja tulange amba banyema betwa bu dinosaures bamwekele ne kwikala’ko mu bula bwa kitatyi kilampe.
Le ba Behemote ne Leviatane bādi banyema betwa bu dinosaures?
Aa.
...
kufunkila pa banyema betwa bu dinosaures. Leza wāsapwidile Yoba atale bano banyema, kadi Yoba wāikele’ko kitayi kilampe kufika ne byapwile kujimankana bano banyema.—Yoba 40:16; 41:8.
Le i bika byāfikīle banyema betwa bu dinosaures?
Bible kesambīlepo pa kujimankana kwa bano banyema. Ino unena’tu amba bintu byonso byāpangilwe “mwanda wa kiswa-mutyima [kya Leza],” nanshi Leza wāpangile bano banyama na kitungo kampanda. (Kusokwelwa 4:11) Pāfikidile kino kitungo, Leza wāleka bano banyema bajimankane.

Tshikosu tshia ngumu ya mu dinda
- Kinshasa : mu tshimenga tshia kinshasa bantu 7 mbafua ne bakuabu batapika mu njiu wa mashinyi mu dinayi edi ku Matadi Kibala mu commune wa mont ngafula . lumu lufila kudi bourgmestre wa commune ewu .
- Kisangani : ndola binunu lukama ki makuta adi bena FRIVAO bapesha bena cliniques universitaires wa kisangani bavua bangata bujitu bua bantu bapetakana ne njiu mu mvita ya matuku 6 ivua mijula kudi bena ouganda .
- Beni : monusco mukumbaja mu ditanu edi dia matuku 29/11 bidimu 25 mu ditunga dia kongo . Ku beni , butembo ne Lubero Monusco uvua mudifila bua kuluisha ngumu ya dishima ne diluisha miaku ya lukinu.
- /sites/default/files/2024-11/291124-p-t-journal_tshiluba_matin_web.mp3

Kinshasa: Tshisangilu tshia mu ngondo muisatu tshia parlemantere tshidi tshienza bua ditangila dia parlemantere ne dishintuluka dia mikenji
Tshisangilu tshia ditunga ne tshia bena sénat anyi bakulumpe ba mabala mbatuadije mu Dibidi dia dikumi ni itangu ngondo muisatu eu mu Kinshasa puila manbo. Tshisangilu bu tshia pa tshibidilu tshia ngondo muisatu, tshidi tshitangila nangananga ditangila dia mbulamatadi ne dishintuluka dia mikenji.
Mu miyuki yabu ya ntuadijilu, bakokeshi ba nzubu yonso ibidi ya Parlement bakakonkonona nsombelu wa tshididi, wa bukubi, wa malu a mpetu, wa malu a bantu ne a bibidilu mu ditunga.
Mulombodi wa Tshisangilu tshia ditunga Christophe Mboso wakeleja kanyinganyinga bua dipanga dia bukubi didi ditungunuka ne kunyanga mushindu wa disungula.
Bua kutantamena lutatu lua malu a bukubi mu ditunga dia Congo, Christophe Mboso udi umanyisha malu a mpangilu a bungi adi ne mushinga wa bungi, nangananga mu malu a bukubi ne a buakane.
Pakatuadija tshisangilu tshia mu ngondo muisatu, Modeste Bahati Lukwebo, mulombodi wa bena mu Sénat wakamba ne: uvua ne kanyinganyinga bua nsombelu wa malu a bukubi udi kawuyi usankisha bantu, nsombelu wa malu a mpetu ne bipupu bia buloba.
Wakamba ne: uvua ne buôwa bua dikuluka dia mushinga wa makuta ne uvua ulomba bua kuenza malu ne lukasa. Udi wamba kabidi ne: mushinga wa makuta udi pa buloba lelu mmupite wa mu budimi bua 2023. Bilondeshile Modeste Bahati Lukwebo, bualu ebu budi bunyangakaja nsombelu wa bantu
Shekinah Gloire Kabongo

- Ban

guka dituku dionso ku Shakoufwa mu province wa Kwango.

96 Imbilayi Yehowa musambu mupiamupia.+Imbilayi Yehowa, buloba bujima!+
2 Imbilayi Yehowa; tumbishayi dîna diende.Manyishayi lumu luimpe lua lupandu luende ku dituku ne ku dituku.+
3 Ambayi butumbi buende munkatshi mua bisamba,Malu ende a kukema munkatshi mua bukua bisamba bionso.+
4 Yehowa mmunene ne mmukumbane bua kumutumbisha bikole.Yeye mmukumbane kumutshina kupita nzambi mikuabu yonso.
5 Nzambi yonso ya bukua bisamba nnzambi ya patupu,+Kadi Yehowa yeye ke wakenza diulu.+
6 Bunene ne butumbi bidi kumpala kuende;+Bukole ne bulengele bidi mu muaba wende munsantu.+
7 Peshayi Yehowa tshidi bu tshiende, nuenu mêku a bukua bisamba,Peshayi Yehowa tshidi bu tshiende bua butumbi buende ne bukole buende.+
8 Peshayi Yehowa butumbi budi buakanyine dîna diende;+Luayi ne dipa ne nubuele mu mbanza yende.
9 Inaminayi Yehowa bavuale bintu bilengele bia tshijila;Zakalayi kumpala kuende, buloba bujima!
10 Manyishayi munkatshi mua bisamba ne: “Yehowa mmulue Mukalenge!+Buloba mbujadikibue bikole, kabuena mua kunyungishibua to.Yeye nealumbuluishe bukua bantu ne buakane.”+
11 Diulu disanke, ne buloba buikale ne disanka;Mbuu akungule ne bionso bidi biuwulamu;+
12 Mpata ne bionso bidimu bisanke.+Mitshi yonso ya muitu yele payi mbila ya disanka dîba dimue dimue adi+
13 Kumpala kua Yehowa, bualu yeye udi ulua,Udi ulua bua kulumbuluisha buloba.
Buloba budi bantu basombele, yeye neabulumbuluishe ne buakane,+Nealumbuluishe bukua bantu ne lulamatu luende.+

NSAPWILE’PO bidi, lelo i dibuku’ka dyoswele mpata kupita onso?—Bana bamo bakokeja kutonga dyodya disambila pa banyema. Bakwabo nabo bakokeja kutonga dibuku didi na bifwatulo bivule. I kya nsangaji kutanga ano mabuku.
Inoko mabuku mayampe mu ino ntanda yonso i oa etusapwila bubinebine bwa padi Leza. Mu ano mabuku namo mudi dibuku dimo ditabuke bulēme. Lelo widiyukile?—I Bible.
Mwanda waka Bible i mupite bulēme?—Mwanda i dibuku ditambe kudi Leza. Ditulombola myanda imutala ne bintu biyampe byaketu
... 
I Luka. Mulembi mukwabo wādi musonkeji wa musonko. Dijina dyandi i Mateo. Ungi nandi wādi mujidiki wa bijila, mupotolodi mukata wa bijila mu mutōtelo wa Bayuda. Wālembele mikanda mivule ya mu Bible kupita bonso. Le uyukile dijina dyandi?— I Polo. Kadi bana ba bwanga ba Yesu, ba Petelo ne Yoano, bādi nabo balembi ba Bible, nansha byobādi babiluwe ba lui.
Balembi bavule ba Bible bālembele bintu byādi bisaka kulonga Leza mu mafuku a kumeso. Le bādi bayuka bino bintu namani abyo papo kebyalongekele?
...
gila Bible pamo. Potutambulanga mukanda utamba kudi muntu otuswele bininge, twiutañanga ne kwiutangulula misunsa ne misunsa. Wikalanga wa bulēme kotudi. Uno o muswelo otufwaninwe netu kumona Bible, mwanda i mukanda mutambe kudi Yewa wituswele kutabuka. I mukanda mutambe kudi Leza wa buswe.
Shi ke pano, witūdile’ko kitatyi kityetye kya kutanga bino bisonekwa bilombola amba Bible i Kinenwa kya Leza binebine, kyālembelwe pa mwanda wa kamweno ketu: Loma 15:4; 2 Temote 3:16, 17; ne 2 Petelo 1:20, 21.

- Kinshasa: luendu luvua bena Comité Laïc de coordination (CLC) ne luenzenka mu dimua dia matuku 21 pamutu pa mu disambombo dia matuku 19 .
- Bunia: Mu Ituri, bena tshimuangi bavula ba congo bakadi bapingana mu misoku yabu . bavua baniema dishipa dia bantu mu territoire wa djugu.
- Bukavu: Nkuenza bidimu 12 bidi ong MSF basombela mu territoire wa Masisi ne utungunuka ne mudimu ewi mu tshipapu etshi tshidi tshipanga bukubi ne bantu bavula baniema mvita .
- Beni: Ku Sud Kivu, Ong Observatoire pour la gouvernance et la paix OGP, udi usonsola balombodi ba bsumbu bia baluma ba mvita bua bobu kumbuka mu majimba .
- Goma:Tushala anu mu province wa Nord-Kivu, muaba udi bena nsangilu wa ba anesthésistes momune nganga buka itu iladisha bantu diba didibu babapenda badi ne dipampakana bua bungi bua bantu badi bafua mu mpitadi mishila shilangana diba didibu babapenda.
- Lubumbashi: Ku lubumbashi bavua makelela mushala batuadija poloje udibu babikila ne Echo VIH RDC. Projet udi bua kushikuluja dimania dia bena malu a bukola bua mubidi mu diambula bujitu bua babedi ba sida.

3 Pauvua muenze malu adi akuatshisha buôwa atuvua katuyi mua kutekemena,+Wakapueka, mikuna kukanka kumpala kuebe.+
4 Katshia ku kale kakuena muntu udi mumvue anyi mufile ditshi,Kaku
... 
Aba badi bakuvuluka ne balonda njila yebe.
Mona! Wewe uvua mufiike munda, patuvua batungunuke ne kuenza mpekatu,+Tuakenza nunku tshikondo tshile.
Mpindieu, tudi ne bua kupandishibua anyi?
6 Ne tuetu bonso tudi balue bu muntu mukoya,Ne bienzedi bietu bionso bia buakane bidi bu tshilamba tshia ku mashi.+
Netufubidile bu dibeji dia mutshi,Ne bilema bietu nebiye netu bu lupepele.
7 Kakuena muntu udi ubila dîna diebe,Muntu nansha umue udiudisonsola bua kukulamata,Bualu udi mutusokoke mpala webe,+Ne u
...
ufiika munda, Yehowa wetu,+Ne kuvuluki tshilema tshietu bua kashidi.
Tutangila koku, bualu tuetu bonso tudi bantu bebe.

11 Nzubu wetu wa bunsantu ne butumbi,Muaba uvua bankambua betu bakutumbishila,Mbamoshe ne kapia,+Ne bintu bionso bituvua banange bikole mbishale bikulu.

MÊYI A MU BIBLE: “Lekelayi kuditatshisha bua mioyo yenu.”—Matayi 6:25.
Bidi biumvuija tshinyi? Yezu wakamba mêyi aa mu muyuki wende wa pa mukuna. Bilondeshile diksionere kampanda dia malu a mu Bible, muaku wa pa muanda wa mu tshiena Greke udibu bakudimune ne: “kuditatshisha” udi mua kumvuija “mushindu utu muntu yonso wenza malu padiye mu bupele, padiye ne tshiji ne ntatu mikuabu itu imufikila mu nsombelu wende wa ku dituku ne ku dituku.” Kuditatshisha kudi kukongoloja kumvua buôwa bua malu adi m
... 
elu wa Yezu. Bua tshinyi? Bamue bantu batu bamba ne: padi bantu bakuabu ne buôwa bua bungi, lungenyi luabu ludi kuulu kuulu, dîba adi “bidi bikebesha masama bu mudi mputa ya mu tshifu, masama a mioyo ne masama a mfuenke.”
Yezu wakaleja bua tshinyi mbimpe kuepuka kuditatshisha kakuyi bualu, bualu kabiena ne mushinga. Wakebeja ne: “Mmuntu kayi wa munkatshi muenu udi mua kusakidila nkubita umue ku bule bua muoyo wende padiye uditatshisha?” (Matayi 6:27) Kuimanyina anu pa buôwa butudi nabu kakuena m
...
u nsombelu wabu majinga abu anyi? (Matayi 6:25, 26, 28-30) Tshibidi, ntatu ya ku dituku ne ku dituku mmikumbane. Yezu wakamba ne: “Kanuditatshishi bua dituku didi dilonda, bualu dituku adi nedikale ne yadi ntatu.” Kuenaku witaba ne: “dituku ne dituku didi ne yadi ntatu idi midikumbanyine” anyi?—Matayi 6:34.
Patudi tulonda mubelu wa Yezu wa meji eu, tudi mua kuepuka masama a bungi a mubidi. Netuikale kabidi ne ditalala dia mu mutshima didi Bible ubikila ne: “ditalala dia Nzambi.”—Filipoyi 4:6, 7.

Léon Tolstoï, bamubikila kabidi ne Lev Nikolaïevitch Tolstoï mu tshiena russe kumpala kwa tshidimu tshia 1918, mmulela mu ngondo wa Kashipu Mpempempe 1828 ne mufwe mu dia 7 kaswabanga ku Astapovo, mmufundi wa beeba Russie. Badi biikala bamuzangika bilondeshile difunda dyende dya miannu udi miikala ileeja kasuba ka beena ditunga diabu mu tshikondo tshia ba Tsar; kadi udi kabidi mwikala ubiipisha bukalenge bwa beena ditunga ne bwa beena maalu a Nzambi.Baka muteeka ba kaseka kudi beena Orthodoxe ba mu Russie. Mifunduyende ivua mioska kunyima kwa lufu lwende.

MABEJI A TSHISANGILU TSHIA NSOMBELU NE MUDIMU WETU WA BUENA KRISTO Ngondo wa 1 2017
Bia kuamba bua kufila tshibejibeji tshia Tshibumba tshia Nsentedi ne kulongesha bulelela budi butangila tshimanyinu tshia matuku a ku nshikidilu. Enza mudimu ne bilejilu ebi bua kukeba tshiebe tshia kuamba.
BIUMA BIA MU DÎYI DIA NZAMBI
Mukalenge Yezu mmuteke bakulu bua kutabalela tshisumbu tshia mikoko. Badi bapetesha tshisumbu tshia mikoko disulakana padibu bayipesha buludiki bua mu nyuma ne bayikolesha.
BIUMA BIA MU DÎYI DIA NZAMBI
Bena Ashû basaka bena Yuda bua kudifilabu pamutu pa kuluabu kubela mvita, kadi Yehowa udi utuma muanjelu wende bua kusungila Yelushalema.
TUIKALAYI NE NSOMBELU WA BUENA KRISTO
Kueyemena Yehowa mu bikondo bimpe ne bibi kudi ne mushinga wa bungi kutudi. Hezikiya uvua muleje ne: uvua mueyemene Nzambi mushindu kayi?
BIUMA BIA MU DÎYI DIA NZAMBI
Mushindu mupepele udi mukanku ubuka kabiyi bimulomba makanda eu udi uleja bimpe mutudi tukumbana bua kutungunuka ne kutendelela Yehowa ku diambuluisha dia bukole budiye utupesha.

1. Tudi ne bua kumanya malu adi atangila banjelu bua tshinyi?
YEHOWA mmusue bua tumanye malu adi atangila dîku diende. Banjelu mbena mu dîku dia Nzambi. Mu Bible badi bababikila ne: ‘Bana ba balume ba Nzambi.’ (Yobo 38:7) Banjelu batu benza tshinyi? Mmunyi muvuabu bambuluishe bantu kale? Badiku mua kutuambuluisha lelu eu anyi?—Tangila Dimanyisha dia ku ndekelu 8.
2. Banjelu bavua bafumine penyi? Bavua bafuke banjelu bungi kayi?
2 Tudi ne bua kumanya kuvua banjelu bafumine. Kolosayi 1:16 udi utua
... 
lualua anyi adi kaayi mamanyike. Muntu udi mua kukeba kubuka padiye ukeba kumanyina malu mu mitoto ne mu ngondo, mu bimanyinu bikuabu, mu tuarte tua kunaya, mu lumuenu, mu mishonyi ya mu bianza, ne mu bilota. Bantu ba bungi batu bela meji ne: bilele ebi ki mbibi to, pabi bikale bibi bia dikema. Tshilejilu, Bible udi uleja ne: bademon ne bena lubuku badi anu bu mukaba ne tshilamba. Mu Bienzedi 16:16-18 badi bakulamu bua “demon wa lubuku” uvua wambuluisha nsongakaji kampanda bua ‘kuamba malu atshi
...
atuku a Noa, ne neababutule mu matuku atshilualua emu. (Yuda 6) Uvuluke ne: katuena tuluangana mvita eyi nkayetu to. Yehowa udi utuma banjelu bende bua kutukuba. (2 Bakalenge 6:15-17) Tudi ne bua kuikala bashindike ne: netutshimune mvita itudi tuluangana ne Satana ne bademon ku diambuluisha dia Yehowa.—1 Petelo 5:6, 7; 2 Petelo 2:9.
19 Kadi bikalabi ne: Satana ne bademon badi bakebesha makenga bungi nunku, bua tshinyi Nzambi ki mmuanji kubabutula? Netuandamune lukonko elu mu nshapita udi ulonda.

‘Bualu bua bantu bakadifila bua disua diabu, nuvudijile Yehowa disanka!’—BALUMBULUISHI 5:2.
MISAMBU: 150, 10
1, 2. a) Ntshinyi tshivua Elifaza ne Biledada bambe bua mudi Nzambi umona mudimu wetu? b) Ntshinyi tshivua Yehowa muambe bua bualu ebu?
KUKADI bidimu bia bungi bivua bantu balume basatu baye kuyukila ne Yobo mutendeledi wa Nzambi wa lulamatu. Umue wa kudibu Elifaza muena Temana, wakela Yobo imue nkonko ya mushinga eyi: ‘Muntu udi mua kukuatshisha Nzambi ne tshintu anyi? Nansha, muntu udi 
... 
 mabue anyi? Bible kena umvuija to. Kadi mbikumbane bua kuela meji ne: Yehowa wakasungila bantu bende pa kulokesha mvula mukole muaba ne pa dîba diakanyine, bua makalu a mvita 900 au kaendi bimpe to. Mu Balumbuluishi 4:14, 15, tudi tubala ne: Yehowa ke uvua muambuluishe bena Isalele bua kutshimuna misangu isatu. Kakuvua nansha umue wa ku bena Isalele bena budisuile 10 000 uvua mua kuamba ne: yeye ke uvua mutshimune to.
10, 11. Meloze uvua tshinyi? Bua tshinyi bakamuela mulawu?
10 Mpindieu tukonk
...
Yehowa, kadi ki bantu to. Bakimba ne: ‘Bualu bua bantu bakadifila bua disua diabu, nuvudijile Yehowa disanka!’ (Balumbuluishi 5:1, 2) Bia muomumue, patudi tuenzela Yehowa mudimu mu mushindu wonso udi ukengedibua, bidi mua kusaka bantu bakuabu bua ‘kuvudijila Yehowa disanka!’
^ tshik. 6 Muele mukobame mmuele mutue, mule ne imue misangu ntshiamu tshikobame tshisakisha bikole. Miele eyi ivua ku makalu a mvita lua ku nkata mishale mipatuke, makalu au avua alua bu mashinyi adi mu lubilu bua kubutula.

TSHIBUMBA TSHIA NSENTEDI (TSHIA KULONGA) Ngondo wa 9 2017
Mu nimero eu mudi biena-bualu bua kulonga kutuadijila mu dia 23/10–26/11/2017.
Umue musangu, Yehowa wakadimanyisha kudi Mose umuambila dîna diende ne ngikadilu yende. Luse ngumue wa ku ngikadilu ya kumpala ivua Nzambi mutele. Luse ntshinyi? Bua tshinyi udi ne bua kuikala ne ngikadilu eu?
MALU A MU NSOMBELU
David Sinclair udi uvuluka amue masanka ne diakalenga divuaye mupete dia kuenza mudimu ne bena Kristo balume ne bakaji ba lulamatu munkatshi mua bidimu 61 bidiye muenze ku Betele.
Bible ke mukanda udibu bapane bikole munkatshi mua bidimu nkama ya bungi panyima pa dimujikija, nansha mudi miakulu ne malu a tshididi bishintuluke ne baluishe dimukudimuna.

- Kinshasa: mu bivundu bidi bienzenka mu ditunga dia afrique du sud , mulopwe wa ditunga dia congo mu ditunga edi udi uvuija ne kakuena muana congo nansha umua udibu bashipa .
- Kinshasa: tulasa ntuatuadija ku Unikin kunyima kua ngondu ibidi ya dimanyika mudimu . kadi ISTM koku balongi mbatomboka bua mushindu udi babu balongeshi kabayi batuadija mudimu.
- Kindu:Mu polovense wa Maniema, balongeshi ba tulasa tua mbula matadi mu sous division EPSP Kasongo-2 mbimanyika mudimu wabu nkuenza matuku asatu . badi balomba mafuta abu a ngondu wa 7 ne 8 mushala .
- Beni: Beni : ku nord kivu mu butuku bua kutshia lelu , ba nkoviongo bavua babuela mu kadiomba ka Radio communautaire du peuple mu quartier Masosi mu tshimenga tshia Oicha ne kuiba bintu bia mudimu . nanku kadiomba aka kakena kabidi kafila ngumu to .
- Beni:an uku Nord Kivu , ba mai mai ba tshisumbu tshia NDC/ rénové badi mu misoku ya Bunyatenge, Mbingi, Mwanza, Bwavinywa,ne Kanyatsi mu territoire wa Lubero badi bafutshisha muntu udi musua kuya ku budimi buenda fcs 1000 ku ngondu yonsu .
- Kinshasa: mayi a kazeza adi lutatu lukola mu cite wa Panzi, territoire wa Kasongo Lunda, mu province wa Kwango.

Malu Makumi Asatu Bua Kukuatshisha
Nawu Bayidi Ba Mukanda Wa Nzambi
JS Robertson
Table des matières :
a) Muntu yonso pa buloba udi ne bitupa bibidi. Tshitupa tshimue tshidi tshimueneka ku mesu: Mubidi wende mene, kadi tshinga tshitupa tshidi katshiyi tshimueneka ku mesu: Muoyo wende. (Matayo 10:28).
b) Bua mubidi, ewu wakumana kuledibua mukese menemene. Papita matuku ne mvula, mubidi udi udiundadiunda ne muntu udi ukola.
c) Muntu udi ne bua kudia pasueye kukolesha mubidi wende, udi ne bua kunua,
... 
ienzedi 3:26). Nunku kusungila bantu kudi kutamba buimpe ku mesu kua Nzambi.
c) Nzambi wakumana kutumanyisha mudiye musue kusungila bantu, bualu bua wakatuma Nyuma Muimpe panshi bua kutangalaja Lumu Luimpe mu buloba bujima, ne mu mitshima ya bantu. (Bienzedi 4:7-12).
d) Bualu bua Nzambi udi ukeba kusankisha bantu, ku dituku ku dituku udi utuma bayidi bende kudi ba bisamba bionso bua kubambila Lumu Luimpe lua Yesu, ne bua bupikudi ku mashi ende. Nansha kutshidi bantu bakuabo ne mpata munda muabo,
...
 neikale pabuipi nende, munangibue kudi Nzambi Tatu, mulongolola ne butumbi buonso bua Mukelenge. Bualu buimpe, tuetu kuikala babanyangana nende ku dinanga diende ne ku butumbi buende bua bidimu ne bidimu kabiyi ne ndekelu. (Efeso 3:20,21).
Mukanda ewu mukese wakadi mufundibue kudi Mukyelengi Mule (W. H. Westcott) mu tshidimu tshia 1906 mu muaku wa Luna Inkongo.
Dina diawu diakadi, "Dikangito Dia Malo Eyeyebwa Mu Mukanda  Ncembi".
Wakadi muandamunibue mu muaku wa Tshiluba mu tshidimu tshia 1983.

Mukanda wa Bible utulongesha ne wa Bible ulongesha idi mumue. Mbiamu bia mudimu bidi ne malongesha malelela a muomumue ne malondangane kabidi mu mushindu wa muomumue. Kadi mu mukanda wa Bible utulongesha kamuena malu mapitepite bungi to. Mbawenze bua badi ne lutatu lua kumvua malu adi mu wa Bible ulongesha. Pamutu pa bisakidila, mbafunde note ku ndekelu kuawu idi ne mumvuija mapepele a imue miaku ne biambilu bidi mu bikoso. Nshapita idimu kayena ne nkonko ku ntuadijilu anyi ne kazubu ka diambulu
... 
o nansha kawuyi mu mikanda ya kufila ngondo au. Mmunyi mutudi mua kulongesha bantu malu a pa buawu adi mu mukanda wa Bible utulongesha patudi tulombola dilonga dia Bible?
MU TSHIKOSO: Bua ba bungi, mushindu ututu tulonga Bible ne bantu, babala bikoso mu mukanda wa Bible ulongesha pashishe tubela nkonko newikale muimpe be. Kadi biobi ne: mulongi wa Bible ki mmumanye muakulu bimpe anyi kayi mumanye kubala bimpe. Mulongi wa nunku tudi mua kulonga nende malu adibu bambe mu tshikoso ku ndekelu kua ns
...
i malu adibu bambe mu tshikoso aa kaayi ne tumalu tuonso tudi mu nshapita, mulongeshi udi ne bua kudilongolola bimpe, muikale ne majinga a mulongi mu lungenyi. Yeye mujikije kulonga nshapita ne mulongi, udi mua kuenza diambulula ne malu adibu bambe mu tshikoso au.
MAMANYISHA A KU NDEKELU: Miaku ne biambilu bidibu bumvuije mu note mbabifunde bilondeshile mudi nshapita milondangane. Mulongeshi ke wamanya ni bidi bikengela kukonkonona note kampanda mu dilonga diabu dia mukanda wa Bible utulongesha.

Mu tshidimu tshia 1892, bamamu babidi ba mapasa Agnes Smith Lewis ne Margaret Dunlop Gibson bakenza luendu lua matuku tshitema pa tumelu tuabu bapitshila mu tshipela batangile ku kuvan wa Sainte Catherine, kuinshi kua mukuna wa Sinayi. Bua tshinyi bakaji aba bavua ne bidimu 40 ne bia mu njila bakenza luendu lua mushindu eu mu tshikondo tshivua kuenza luendu lua nunku mu matunga a mu Asie kuikale bualu bua njiwu? Diandamuna dia lukonko elu didi mua kukuambuluisha bua kukolesha ditabuja diudi nadi
... 
ietu ebi, bivuija maniskri a Bible aa a kale menemene. Bu mu bidimu bia 508 bikondo bietu ebi, pavuabu balue kufundulula Bible wa Peshitta bavua bakumbaje mikanda itanu ivua kayiyimu. Uvua mulue kumanyika mu dîna dia Nkudimuinu wa Philoxénie.
MANISKRI A BUNGI A MU TSHIENA SULIA AVUABU BAPETE
Too ne mu bidimu 1800, mikanda yonso ya bena Kristo ivua mu tshiena Greke ivua mimanyike ivua ya mu bidimu bia 400 anyi bidimu bishadile ku ebi. Bua bualu ebu, bamanyi ba malu a mu Bible bavua batamba kutaba
...
unku bidi bileja ne: mêyi adibu basakidile mu 1 Yone 5:7 adi bushuwa dinyanga dia mêyi a mu Bible.
Bidi biumvuika patoke ne: Yehowa Nzambi mmulame Dîyi diende Dinsantu anu muvuaye mulaye. Bible udi utujadikila mu bualu ebu ne: ‘Mashinde adi afubidila, tshilongo tshidi tshitutuka; kadi dîyi dia Nzambi wetu nedijalame tshiendelele.’ (Yeshaya 40:8; 1 Petelo 1:25) Nkudimuinu wa Peshitta mmuambuluishe ndambu, kadi udi ne mushinga wa bungi mu dikudimuna mukenji wa mu Bible ne bujalame bua bantu bonso.

Mu bungi, bamfumu ba matunga dikumi ni isatu anyi baleji mpala babu, sekretere munene wa ONU Antonio Gutteres ne baleji mpala ba AU, ba CIRGL ne ba SADC bakitaba bua kubuela mu tshisangilu etshi tshidi tshianji kutuadija mu Bujumbura mu din
...

Bidi bimueneka patoke ne: bidimu 10 pashishe, malu akanyanguka bikole pavuabu baleje ne: ditunga dia Rwanda divua dienze mvita ne ditunga dia RDC muinshi mua dibikila dia tshisumbu tshia bena tshinyangu tshia M23.

...

DRC mmukumbaje malu adiye muditshiye mu tshipungidi etshi ne ditabuja dionso, eku bakuabu kabayi benze malu ne bululame.
Mu bisangilu ebi, mulombodi wa ditunga Felix Tshisekedi neapeshe mulombodi wende Evariste Ndayishimiye bukokeshi.
Malu a mu tshisangilu etshi neajike dilolo adi ne diumvuija dia ndekelu.

... 
pesha bansonga ba bungi mpunga wa kuleja mamanya abu. “Kupangila bua kulombola mudimu eu kudi mua kufikisha ku difua dia biapu bia bungi. Tudi balue bua kudimuija bantu ne kuleja mushindu utudi petu mua kuambuluisha bua kushintulula malu adi ministre wa malu a ngumu wamba”.
Tshiena-bualu tshibidi tshivuabu bakonkonone mu muyuki eu tshivua tshia dikoka bantu ku budisuile.
Bua Didier M’Pambia, budisuile budi buambuluisha bua kuibaka midimu ne kuimansha bantu mu dikenga. Tudi tuenda tuenza mudimu n
...
 Muyaya bua diambuluisha divuaye mumupeshe mu dienza dia mukanda wa bantu badi benza mudimu wa dimanyisha malu mu ditunga dia République démocratique du Congo.

Myoto Liyolo (Mukuatshishi wa mulombodi).

Patu muntu udiumvua bu udi usua kukuluka, utu ukeba kukuata ku tshintu. Meme tshiena mua kuenza nanku to, bualu tshiena ne bianza ne maboko. Bakankosa maboko pamvua ne bidimu 7 bua kusungila muoyo wanyi.
Maman wanyi wakandela mu 1960 pavuaye ne bidimu 17. Papa wakatushiya kumpala kua meme kuledibua. Meme ne maman tuakaya kusomba ne baledi bende mu katshimenga kakese ka mu République Démocratique Allemande anyi ku Est kua Allemagne. Bantu ba bungi ba mu katshimenga aka kabavua bitaba ne: Nzambi u
... 
ila dikalaku dia Nzambi patuvua tuenda tukonkonona milayi ya buprofete ya mu Bible. Milayi ya Nzambi ya bungi ikadi mikumbane, nansha muvuayi mifundisha kukavua bidimu nkama anyi mene binunu ne binunu. Dimue dituku patuvua tuyukila malu a mu Bible, tuakafuanyikija nsombelu udiku mu bulongolodi ebu ne mêyi a buprofete adi mu Matayi nshapita 24, Luka nshapita 21, ne 2 Timote nshapita 3. Anu bu mutu munganga usambakaja bimanyinu bidi kudi mubedi, ne bimuambuluisha bua kuenza mateta ne kumanya disam
...
e: ‘Yehowa udi bukole buanyi, ndi mukuatshishibue. Nunku mutshima wanyi udi utamba kusanka.’ (Misambu 28:7) Ebu mbulelela bundi musue kukuata mu nsombelu wanyi mujima. Ndi mubuakidile nansha mundi tshiyi ne maboko ne bianza.
^ tshik. 17 Bua kumanya malu makuabu adi atangila matuku a ku nshikidilu, bala nshapita wa 9, wa mu mukanda wa Bible utu ulongesha tshinyi menemene? wa ne: “Tudi mu ‘matuku a ku nshikidilu’ anyi?” mupatula kudi Bantemu ba Yehowa udi kabidi ku enternete mu site wa www.jw.org.

Alex udi utua mikemu padiye utuntumuna dibuki dia bujitu bua kudiela mu mashinyi manene a mu kompanyi mudiye wenzela mudimu. Udi udiebeja ne: ‘Bua tshinyi ndi ngenza mudimu udi kauyi mua kungambuluisha bua kuya kumpala? Ndîba kayi dingikala mua kulubuluka panyi? Bu meme tshiyi ngenza mudimu eu, mvua mua kuikala ne nsombelu muimpe mutambe!’
Anu bu Alex, bantu ba bungi lelu ki mbanange kuenza midimu mikole to. Aaron mulongolodi wa biamu, udi wamba ne: “Bantu ba bungi badi bela meji ne: kuenza mudi
... 
e mmuenenu wabu. Mathieu mulongolodi wa bintu udi wamba ne: “Bantu badi bela meji ne: paudi wenza mudimu mukole bua kupeta tshiakudia, malu ebe kaena aya kumpala to.” Nsentedi mukuabu diende Shane mmumone pende bantu ne lungenyi elu. Udi wamba ne: “Bantu ki mbasue kuenza mudimu wa dituku dijima bua kupeta difutu dia dituku dijima to.”
Kadi bantu ba bungi badi ne nsombelu muimpe mbasue kuenza mudimu mukole. Daniel nsongalume wa bidimu 25 udi wenza mudimu wa luibaku udi wamba ne: “Ndi ngela meji n
...
 bantu bu mudi Daniel ne Andre bapete mmuenenu muimpe bua mudimu mukole? Mu tshikoso, mbatumikile mêyi a mu Bible mu nsombelu wabu. Pamutu pa Bible kutekesha bantu mu mikolo bua kuenza mudimu mukole, udi yeye ubakolesha bua kunanukila ne dienza mudimu. Bible udi utuambila bua kuenza mudimu ne udi kabidi utuleja mua kunanga mudimu wetu.
Mmêyi kayi a mu Bible adi mua kukuambuluisha bua kuikala ne disanka mu mudimu webe? Tudi tukulomba bua ukonkonone amue a kudiwu mu tshiena-bualu tshidi tshilonda.

Mu bidimu binayi tshianana, ditunga dia Congo wa mungalata divua dilwangana bikole bua kujikija dikosa dia mishiku mu midimu ya Mbulamatadi.
Bilondeshile Transparency International, tshibambalu tshidi katshiyi tshia mbulamatadi tshidibu batume kudi ONU bua kulondolola malu adibu benza bua kuluisha dikosa dia mishiku, ditunga dia Congo wa mungalata didi mu muaba wa lukama makumi muanda mutekete nibidi (172) mu tshidimu tshia 2019. Mpindieu ditunga didi mu muaba wa lukama makumi atangu ni muanda mukulu (158) mu 2024.
Tshibambalu etshi tshidi tshifikisha ditunga dia Congo ,ditunga dia mu Afrike dia kumpala mu malu adi atangila dikandika dikosa mishiku. Bungi bua bintu bidibu balengeje ebi mu mudimu udi wenzeka kudi mfumu wa ditunga diende Félix Tshisekedi.
IGF uvua ne mudimu munene mu dikosa bena mafiya ne mu dienza malu makole bua kuluisha dikosa dia mishiku. Bipeta ebi bidi bikankamija ni bidi bileja ne: ditunga dia Congo wa mungalata didi mu njila muimpe bua kuakaja budimu ne buakane mu malu a mbulamatadi.
Diluisha dikosa dia mishiku mu ditunga edi, Didi dishala kipatshila kanene bua kulengeja nsombelu mu bibambalu bia Mbulamatadi.
Gloire Kabongo

Muoyo utudi nawu eu ke wonso anyi?
Ukadiku mudiebeje ni kudi tshintu tshikuabu tshidi tshipite kunaya, kuenza mudimu, kubuela mu dibaka, kuenza dîku ne kukulakaja anyi? (Yobo 14:1, 2) Bible udi uleja ne: nansha bena meji ba bungi bakadi badiebeje pabu nanku.—Bala Muambi 2:11.
Muoyo udiku ne tshipatshila kampanda anyi? Bua kumanya ni udi natshi, tuanji kudiebeja ne: muoyo uvua mutuadije bishi? Padi bantu bamona mushindu wa dikema udi buongo ne mubidi bifukibue, mbafike ku ditaba ne: Mufuki wa meji ke udi mutufuke. (Bala Musanbu wa 139:14.) Bikalabi nanku, mmutufuke ne tshipatshila kampanda! Kumanya tshipatshila etshi nekutupeteshe nsombelu wa nsongo.
Bua tshinyi Nzambi uvua mufuke bantu?
Nzambi wakabenesha mulume ne mukaji ba kumpala, kubapeshaye mudimu wa disanka. Uvua musue bua buuje buloba, babuvuije mparadizu ne bikale ne muoyo kashidi.—Bala Genese 1:28, 31.
Disua dia Nzambi diakapanga kukumbana pakabenga bantu kutumikila mukenji wende. Kadi Nzambi kakatubenga ne kakashintulula dijinga diende bua bantu ne bua buloba to. Bible udi utujadikila ne: Nzambi utshidi amu ukeba kusungila bantu ba lulamatu ne disua diende bua buloba nedikumbane! Nunku Nzambi mmusue bua wikale ne nsombelu uvuaye musue bua bantu bikale nende! (Bala Musambu wa 37:29.) Ku diambuluisha dia Bible, manya tshia kuenza bua kupeta masanka adi Nzambi mulongoluele bantu.

Makanya adi ashipa bantu muinshi muinshi.
Ndishipe bantu 100000000 mu bidimu bishale ebi.
Ku tshidimu tshionso, makanya atu ashipa bantu batue ku 6000000.
Badi batshinka ne: mu sekonde isambombo yonso, muntu udi ufua bua makanya.
Bidi bimueneka ne: kakuena dishintuluka nansha dikese to.
Bamfumu ba matunga badi batshinka ne: bantu bobu batungunuke ne kunua makanya mudibu banua mpindieu, pakuamba tufike mu 2030, bungi bua bantu badi bafua ku tshidimu tshionso bua dinua dia makanya nebuvule kupita

THOMAS EMLYN uvua nganyi? Ntshinyi tshivua tshimusake bua kuakuila bulelela? Tshilejilu tshiende tshidi mua kutuambuluisha mushindu kayi lelu eu?
Bua kuandamuna nkonko eyi, tudi dijinga ne kuanji kumanya malu avua menzeke ku ndekelu kua bidimu bia 1600 ne ku ntuadijilu kua bidimu bia 1700 mu ditunga dia Angleterre ne dia Irlande. Ekeleziya wa mu Angleterre uvua ne bukokeshi bua bungi. Kuvua bimvundu bia bungi pankatshi pa tusumbu tua batendeledi bua malongesha ne bilele bia mu Ekeleziya.
THOMAS 
... 
 Irlande bavua basombe ne banzuji bua kumulumbuluisha. Kabavua nansha banyishile Emlyn bua kuakulaye bua kudibingisha to. Richard Levins mumanyi wa mikenji munene wakambila Emlyn ne: “kavua ne dîyi dia kuamba to.” Ku ndekelu kua tshilumbu, nzuji munene wa mu Irlande diende Pyne wakambila balumbuluishi ne: nuenu kanuyi bakose tshilumbu etshi mu mushindu utudi batekemene, pamuapa “bamfumu ba tshitendelelu tshiende” badi muaba eu badi mua kulomba bua banunyoke.
“Mvua muanyishe bua kukengeshibua bua
...
ha malelela a mushinga adiye mupete mu Mifundu minsantu ne bijadiki biawu, bua tshinyi udi ubala Bible ne ukeba malongesha adimu?” Emlyn udi wimanyina bulelela.
Tshilejilu tshidi Emlyn ne bakuabu bashiye tshidi tshitusaka bua kudikonkonona bua kumanya ni tudi badiakaje bua kubingisha bulelela padibu batupetula. Tuetu petu tudi mua kudiebeja ne: ‘Ntshinyi tshidi ne mushinga, ndumu ne masanka bitudi tupeta mu tshitendelelu anyi peshi tshidi ne mushinga nkubingisha bulelela bua mu Dîyi dia Nzambi?’

Ntshinyi tshienza Yezu mu matuku atshilualua?
Mu tshidimu tshia 33 bikondo bietu ebi, Yezu wakafua, kumujulabu ku lufu ne kubandaye mu diulu. Bidimu bikese pashishe, bakapesha Yezu bukokeshi bua kukokesha bu Mukalenge. (Danyele 7:13, 14) Mu matuku atshilualua, Yezu neenze malu bu Mukalenge bua kufila ditalala pa buloba ne kumbusha bupele.
Bu mudi Yezu Mukalenge, neumbushe malu mabi onso pa buloba
Yezu neenze malu a kukema patuadijaye kukokesha bantu pa buloba. Neakuate mudimu ne bukole budi Tatuende mumupeshe bua kupingaja bantu ku bupuangane. Nebikale ne nsombelu muimpe mutambe pa buloba, kabayi bakulakaja anyi bafua to.
Ntshinyi tshidi Yezu wenza mpindieu?
Yezu udi ulombola mpindieu mudimu wa diyisha udi bayidi bende balelela benza pa buloba bujima. Badi baya kutangila bantu bua kubaleja tshidi Bible wamba bua Bukalenge bua Nzambi. Yezu wakamba ne: neatungunuke ne kuambuluisha bayidi bende mu mudimu eu too ne pikala Bukalenge bua Nzambi mua kubutula mbulamatadi ya bana ba bantu.
Yezu udi ulombola bantu bua kuikala ne nsombelu muimpe ku diambuluisha dia tshisumbu tshia bena Kristo. Neatungunuke ne kubalombola too ne pikala ndongoluelu eu wa malu mua kubutuka ne kubabueja mu buloba bupiabupia budi Nzambi mulaye.

Njila wa mmuoyo udi usua kua mbamba tshinyi?
Lukonko: Njila wa mmuoyo udi usua kua mbamba tshinyi?
Diandamuna: Udi ne nzala anyi? Ki nzala ya mubidi to, kadi udi ne nzala ya tshintu tshitamba mu moyo weba anyi? Kudi tshintu kampanda mu moyi weba amu tshiudi natshidijinga anyi? Ikala bi bulelela, Yezu njila! Yezu udi wamba ne, Yezu wakabambila ne, “ndi diampa dia muoyo. Muntu yonso udi ulua kundi kakumvua kabidi nzala nansha kakese, ne muntu yonso udi uleja ditabuja kundi, kakumvua kabidi nyota n
... 
 wamba ne, “Meme ndi dibishibua ku lufu ne muoyo, muntu yonso udi ne muoyo ne uleja ditabuja kundi, kakufua nansha kakese. Udi witabuja bualu ebu anyi”. (Yone11:25-26).
Njila mua buena kuamba tshinyi? Bulelela mbuena kuamba tshinyi? Muoyo mbuena kuamba tshinyi? Yezu udi wandamuna ne ndi, “Meme ndi njila ne bulelela ne muoyo. Muntu kena mua kulua kudi Tatu kayi mupitshile kundi to.” (Yone14:6).
Nzala yiudi uvua iyi nyia nyiuma, anu Yezu ki udi bua ku ijikija, anu yezu nkayende ki udi mua kumbusha
...
ala ne muoyo panyima pa lufu.muoyo wa kujuka bua diulu dia tshiendelele ne Yezu!
“Eyowa nzambi uvua munange ba pa buloba bikole menemene, kufikaye ne ku difila muanende mulela umuepele, bua muntu yonso udi uleja ditabuja kudiye kabutudibu, kadi apete muoyo wa tshiendelele”. (Yone3:16).
Ukadi muangata di angadika dia dia kulonda kristo bilondashila biudi ubala anyi? Biobi bikala nanku ushidikila lubota ludi kulu elu “ndi muakadila Kristo lelu”.
English
Njila wa mmuoyo udi usua kua mbamba tshinyi?

“Nuikale bantu ba tshijila.”—LEW. 11:45.
1. Mmunyi mudi mukanda wa Lewitiki mua kutuambuluisha?
MU MUKANDA wa Lewitiki, badi batamba kuakula bua muaku tshijila kupita mu mikanda mikuabu yonso ya mu Bible. Bu mudibu balomba batendeledi balelela ba Yehowa bonso bua kuikala ne ngikadilu eu, kumvua ne kuanyisha mukanda wa Lewitiki nekutuambuluishe bua tuetu kuikala ba tshijila.
2. Ngamue malu kayi adi mu Lewitiki?
2 Mukanda wa Lewitiki uvuabu bafunde kudi muprofete Mose udi tshitupa tshia “dîyi dion
... 
u Tshibumba tshia Nsentedi tshia mu 1925 mu tshiena-bualu tshia ne: “Diledibua dia tshisamba” nansha muvua bamue baela mpata. Ditumikila edi divua dikemeshe muanetu eu bikole. Kuela meji pa malu adi bana betu basatu batudi batele aba bambe kudi mua kukuambuluisha bua kuleja muudi wa tshijila pa kutumikila.
DITUMIKILA MUKENJI WA NZAMBI WA MASHI
10. Kutumikila mukenji wa Nzambi bua mashi kudi ne mushinga kayi?
10 Bala Lewitiki 17:10. Yehowa wakambila bena Isalele bua kabadi “mashi” kayi onso. Kule
...
amuapa, dilonga edi ndivudije dianyisha dietu bua mukanda wa mu Bible mufundisha ku nyuma wa Nzambi eu. Kakuyi mpata, kuelangana meji bua amue malu a mushinga adi mu mukanda wa Lewitiki nkukuleje malu adi atusaka bua kuikala ba tshijila. Kadi, mmalu kayi makuabu a mushinga adi mu tshitupa tshia mu Dîyi dia Nzambi difundisha ku nyuma wende etshi? Mmalu kayi makuabu adi atangila mudimu wetu wa tshijila utudi tuenzela Yehowa atudi ne bua kumanya? Netulonge malu aa mu tshiena-bualu tshidi tshilonda.

Mu tshikondo tshivuabu bafunda Bible, tshilele tshia kudipanda bilamba ku bukole tshivua tshimvuija tshinyi?
Bible udi uleja nsombelu ndambu ivua bantu badipande bilamba. Tshienzedi etshi tshidi mua kukemesha bantu lelu, kadi bua bena Yuda tshivua tshileja ne: muntu uvua ne kanyinganyinga, mubungame, mupuekeshibue milongo, ne udi tshiji anyi mmufuishe.
Tshilejilu, Lubena ‘wakapanda tshivualu tshiende’ pakamonaye ne: malu avuaye mulongolole bua kusungila muanabu Jozefe kaakakumbana, bualu bakapan
... 
o bavua bafue. (Yobo 1:18-20) Muntu muikale ne ‘bilamba bipandike’ wakamuenekela Muakuidi Munene Eli bua kumambila ne: bavua batshimune bena Isalele mu mvita, bashipe bana ba Eli ba balume babidi ne banyenge mushete wa tshipungidi. (1 Sam. 4:12-17) Pakumvua Yoshiya mêyi a Mukenji avuabu bamubadila ne kumvua ne: bantu bende bavua benze tshilema, ‘wakadipanda bilulu biende.’—2 Bak. 22:8-13.
Pavuabu balumbuluisha Yezu, Muakuidi munene Kayifa “wakapanda bilamba biende bia pa mutu,” bualu uvua wela m
...
 Kadi mukenji mukuabu wa ba rabbi uvuabu bele panyima pa dibutuka dia Yelushalema wakaleja ne: “Lelu muntu yeye mumvue bapenda dîna dia Nzambi, kena ne bua kupanda bilamba biende to, bualu bilamba bikuabu bivua mua kuikala bimane kupandika.”
Bushuwa, tshilele tshia kudipanda bilamba katshivua ne mushinga ku mesu kua Nzambi bikala uvua utshienza kayi ne kanyinganyinga kalelela to. Nunku, Yehowa wakambila bantu bende bua ‘kupanda mitshima yabu, kabapandi bivualu biabu, bapingane kudiye.’—Yoe 2:13.

TSHITUPA 2
‘Mmunange kulumbulula kuakane’
Malu adi kaayi makane anyi a kansungansunga mmatampakane lelu pa buloba, nunku bantu ba bungi badi bela Yehowa tshilumbu pambidi. Kadi Bible udi ulongesha bulelela budi butusankisha bikole bua ne: “Yehowa udi unanga kulumbulula kuakane.” (Musambu 37:28) Mu tshitupa etshi, netulonge mushindu udi Yehowa mukumbaje mêyi aa adi apetesha bukua bantu ditekemena.
MU TSHITUPA ETSHI
NSHAPITA 11
Mmunyi mudi buakane bua Nzambi buikale ngikadilu muimpe?
NSHAPITA 12
Bikala Yehowa mukine malu mabi, bua tshinyi mmuule tente pa buloba nunku?
CHAPTER 13
Mmunyi mudi nkoselu wa bilumbu utusaka ku dinanga?
CHAPTER 14
Dilongesha dipepele kadi dia mushinga mukole didi mua kukuambuluisha bua kusemena pabuipi ne Yehowa.
CHAPTER 15
Mmunyi muvua Yezu muleje buakane ku kale? Mmunyi mudiye ubuleja lelu? Mmunyi muajadikaye buakane matuku atshilualua?
NSHAPITA WA 16
Bua tshinyi Yezu wakatudimuija wamba ne: “Lekelayi kulumbuluishangana bua kabanulumbuluishi penu”?

- Bukavu : bantu 13 mbafua , buloba bupomoka ne nzubu miupuka mu nvula uvua muloka mu disambombo dilolo mu tshimenga tshia Bukavu .
- Beni : bantu basatu mbakuata ne disama dia ebola ku beni . bilondeshela nganga buka mulombodi wa kasumbu ka diluisha disama edi udi uvuija ne babedi aba mbumbukila mu tshipapu tshia bukola bua mubidi tshia Mabalako.
- Bunia: Mu Ituri, meku matua ku tshinunu ne nkama itanu adi mu lutatu lukola mu musoku wa Mwanga ne ku mpenga kuenda mu chefferie Baboa Bokoe mu Territoire wa Irumu.
- Mbuji Mayi: Mu province wa Lomami, mushinga wa matala mupueka bikola mu tshimenga Mwene-Ditu katshia ku ndekelu kua lumingu lushala .
- Butembo:Ku Butembo, depot umua wa kasoloni uvua mukuata kapia mu butuku bua kutshia lelu wa dimua mu quartier Bwinyole commune wa Kimemi.
- Kinshasa: Mu tshilumbu tshia dikanga dia université wa kinshasa, ministre kavula mbedi muambila ministre wa action humanitaire bua kunana lungenyi pa mushindu wa udibu mua kuambuluisha balongi ba Unikin badi kabayi ne baledi mu tshimenga tshia kinshasa.

MUKANDA wa Buakabuluibua udi ne imue miaku ya mu tshimfuanyi. (Buakabuluibua 1:1) Tshilejilu, udi wakula bua muntu mukaji udi ne dîna dia “Babulona Munene” difunda pa mpala pende. Bible udi wamba ne: mmusombe pa ‘bisumbu bia bantu ne bisamba.’ (Buakabuluibua 17:1, 5, 15) Bu mudi muntu mukaji wetu eu kayi mua kuenza malu aa, Babulona Munene mmukaji wa mu tshimfuanyi. Kadi ndumba eu udi umvuija tshinyi?
Mu Buakabuluibua 17:18 badi kabidi babikila muntu mukaji eu ne: ‘musoko munene udi ukokesha ku 
... 
okeshi budi mua kuikala bua malu a tshididi, a bungenda anyi a nzambi. Babulona Munene ki mbukokeshi bua malu a tshididi to, bualu Bible udi wamba ne: ‘bakalenge ba pa buloba’ anyi bena malu a tshididi badi ‘benda nende masandi.’ Bundumba ebu ke malanda adiye mudie ne bamfumu ba pa buloba ne ke bua tshinyi badi bamubikila ne: ndumba munene.—Buakabuluibua 17:1, 2; Yakobo 4:4.
Babulona Munene ki mbukokeshi bua malu a bungenda to, bualu ‘bangenda-mushinga’ nebadile pamushipabu. Bible udi uleja mudi
...
ikila Babulona Munene ne: “muaba wa bademon.” (Buakabuluibua 18:2; Dutelonome 18:10-12) Badi baleja kabidi mudiye uluisha tshitendelelu tshilelela bualu udi ukengesha “baprofete” ne ‘bansantu.’ (Buakabuluibua 18:24) Bua kuleja mudi Babulona Munene mukine tshitendelelu tshilelela, udi ukengesha bikole ‘bamanyishi ba Yezu’ ne ubashipa. (Buakabuluibua 17:6) Nunku, mamu udibu babikila ne: Babulona Munene udi nsangilu wa bitendelelu bionso bia dishima bia pa buloba bujima bidi biluisha Yehowa Nzambi.

Lukonko: Buebe wewe, tuetu tudiela nkonko ya mushinga bu mudi bua kumanya muvua muoyo mutuadije, tudi ne bua kuashila ditabuja dietu pa tshinyi?
Mvese: Eb 11:1
Difila: Anu mudi mvese eu uleja, tudi ne bua kuashila ditabuja dietu pa “tshijadiki tshia malu malelela.” Broshire eu udi wandamuna nkonko minene itanu ya muvua muoyo mutuadije, ne tshidi bijadiki bia kueyemena bileja.

Mvua ne disanka dia bungi dia kupingana mu tulasa tua bana ba mu tulasa tua kumpala, ka ku ntuadijilu ne ka mu tulasa tua bibamdilu tua mu école wa La Grace mu Disatu dia lumingu lushale, bidimu bibidi panyima pa bamane kubalengeja bua kuenza mudimu wanyi.
Bua dibikila dia Tony Mwaba, mulombodi wa tulasa tua malu a tshididi, ntu ngela tuasakidila ne muoyo mujima, ngakaya mu tshibilu tshia dipesha bana betu mikanda ya mikenji ivua mianyishile tulasa etu bua kuenza mudimu ne kulongesha ne biamu. Baledi ba balongi badi ne bungi budi buenda buvula mu tshimenga tshia Kisenso badi bamone bualu ebu.
Ndi ngela kalumbandi bua didienzeja ne dipangadika dia mbulamatadi bua kuakaja nsombelu wa tulasa tua bana betu ne balongeshi mu malu adibu benze bua kulongesha tulasa tua nshindamenu tshianana katshia ku tshidimu tshia 2019.
Shekinah Gloire Kabongo

Dishipa dia muena mu mpungilu wa ditunga Cherubin Okende ne muakuidi wa tshisumbu tshia Ensemble pour la République, bavua bapete mubidi wende mufue ku luseke lua jeep wende mu dia 13 ngondo wa muanda mutekete mu Kinshasa, didi dibueja malu a bungi.
Umue wa kudibu uvua Cynthia Katanga, mumanyi wa malu a tshididi, uvua mumvue bibi bua bualu ebu. M
“Muananyi wa mushinga mukole mukeruba, balale tulu bua kashidi, ndi nkufunda bualu ebu ne kanyinganyinga ku muoyo. Makelela, ngakasambila bua nuenu bonso nuikale bimpe. Ndi mumanye ne: njila ya Nzambi kayena mua kujinguluka to, kadi ndi mumanye kabidi ne: Nzambi ke udi ne buakane bulelela.
Nzambi atungunuke ne kulama dîku diebe ne disanka diende dikale misangu yonso bukole buebe. Ndi ne mukawu bua mubelu webe.
Mvua anu nkuambila ne: udi umue wa ku bena tshididi banene ne bena lulamatu ba mu ditunga dietu.
Wikale ne ditalala.
I’ve never felt so bad to write a post” udi wamba mu twitter wende
Bilondeshile tshisumbu tshia tshididi tshia Ensemble pour la République, bavua banyenge ministre wa malu a bungenda wa kanemu mu Disatu dia 12 ngondo wa 7 mu dîba dia 15:00 mu lupangu lua mashinyi lua Kabadi ka mikenji ya ditunga kumpala kua bamupete mufue dituku diakalonda.
Shekinah Gloire Kabongo

1. Mbualu kayi butambe bubi buvua buenzekele Petelo mu nsombelu wende?
PETELO kavua mua kupua muoyo dîba divua mêsu ende ne a Yezu matuilangane to. Mêsu a Yezu avuaku alumbuluisha Petelo peshi aleja ne: uvua mumuele mâyi ku makasa anyi? Katuena bamanye to, bualu Bible udi wamba amu ne: “Mukalenge kukudimuka, kutangila Petelo.” (Luka 22:61) Kadi Petelo wakamona muvuaye mupangile bualu anu musangu wakamutapa Yezu dîsu au. Wakajingulula muvuaye ufuma ku dienza bualu bukavua Yezu muambe ne: neamuvil
... 
impe ku bukenke bua kapia. Wakamumanya. Wakamuela patoke wamba ne: “Wewe pebe uvua ne Yezu wa mu Galela.” Biakakemesha Petelo, nunku wakavila muvuaye kayi mumanye Yezu, kuamba too ne muvuaye kayi mumanye bualu buvua nsongakaji wamba. Kuyaye kuimana pabuipi ne tshiibi tshia nzubu udisokoka, kadi nsongakaji mukuabu kumumonaye, kuambaye bia muomumue ne: “Muntu eu uvua ne Yezu wa mu Nazaleta.” Petelo kuditshipaye wamba ne: “Tshiena mumanye muntu au to!” (Mat. 26:69-72; Mâko 14:66-68) Petelo wakumvua
...
zu mumupeshe dia kufuilangana luse to.—Bala 1 Petelo 3:8, 9; 4:8.
29. Mmunyi mutudi mua kuidikija ditabuja dia Petelo, ne difuilangana luse dia Mfumuende?
29 Tudi petu mua kupeta dilongesha dia muomumue. Tutuku tulomba Nzambi luse dituku dionso bua bilema bia bungi bitutu tuenza anyi? Tutuku tuitaba mudiye mutufuile luse, ne tuitaba mudi luse alu mua kutulengeja anyi? Tutuku petu tufuila bantu bakuabu luse anyi? Tuetu tuenza nanku, tudi tuidikija ditabuja divua nadi Petelo ne luse lua Mfumuende.

Bua tshinyi tudi ne bua kuvuluka lufu lua Yezu?
Mu malu a bantu, lufu lua Yezu luvua bualu bua mushinga mukole, bualu wakafua bua kupingaja bantu ku nsombelu uvuabu ne bua kuikala nende. Muntu kavua mufukibue bua kuenza malu mabi, kusama anyi kufua to. (Genese 1:31) Kadi, bubi buakabuela mu bantu bua Adama muntu wa kumpala. Yezu wakafila muoyo wende bua kutusungila ku bubi ne ku lufu.—Bala Matayi 20:28; Lomo 6:23.
Nzambi wakaleja dinanga dia pa buadi pakatumaye Muanende pa buloba bua kutufuila. (1 Yone 4:9, 10) Yezu wakambila bayidi bende bua kuenza tshibilu ne diampa ne mvinyo bua kuvuluka lufu luende. Patudi tuenza nunku ku tshidimu tshionso, tudi tuleja dianyisha bua dinanga didi Nzambi ne Yezu batuleje.—Bala Luka 22:19, 20.
Nnganyi udi ne bua kudia diampa ne kunua mvinyo?
Pavua Yezu wambila bayidi bende bua kuvuluka lufu luende, wakakula bua tshipungidi kampanda. (Matayi 26:26-28) Tshivua tshibapesha bobu ne bantu bakuabu bakese ditekemena dia kulua bakalenge ne bakuidi pamue nende mu diulu. Nansha mudi bantu miliyo ya bungi bavuluka lufu lua Yezu, anu aba badi mu tshipungidi etshi ke badi badia diampa ne banua mvinyo.—Bala Buakabuluibua 5:10.
Yehowa ukadi mutuadije kusungula bantu aba kukadi bidimu bitue ku 2 000. (Luka 12:32) Patudi tubufuanyikija ne bantu bapeta muoyo wa tshiendelele pa buloba, bungi buabu mbukese be!—Bala Buakabuluibua 7:4, 9, 17.

Yezu wakambila Basadoke ne: bantu babika ku lufu “kabena basela anyi basedibua to.” (Luka 20:34-36) Uvuaku wakula bua bantu babika bua kupeta muoyo pa buloba anyi?
Elu ndukonko lua mushinga mukole, nangananga kudi aba badi bafuishe bena dibaka nabu bavuabu banange. Bantu ba mushindu eu badi mua kuikala bajinga ne muoyo mujima bua kupetangana kabidi mu dibaka ne bena dibaka nabu aba mu bulongolodi bupiabupia pababishabu. Musulu wa manyimanyi (mu tshiena Chine:mu tshiena Chine: Huáng hé) udi musulu muibidi mutambe bule mu ditunga dia Chine. Musulu eu udi ne bule bua kilometre 5.464 ne udi ufumina mu tshibandabanda tshia mu Tibet, upitshila mu provense ya Gansu,ya Ningxia, ya Mongolie wa munda, ya Shaanxi, ya Shanxi, ya Henan, ne ya Shandong, ne upitshila mu Mbuu wa Bohai, udibu babikila kabidi ne:Mbuu Mufiike.Tshitupa tshia mâyi a musulu eu tshidi ne bunene bua kilometre 752 443 tshidi ne tshipepele tshikole tshidi tshienza bua musulu wikale ne lupepele lutekete ku mbelu (2 571 m3/s).

Difika diakana ku bibi bia Tabernacle wa Reconciliation.
Eu muaba wa tshijila wa Malongesha a Yesu Christ ne balongi bende. Malongesha aa avua mashintuludibua munkatshi mua bidimu bipita bungi kudi bitendeledi bia mishindu mishilangana, mmavua kualuija mu bulelela buawo kudi muanetu William Marrion Branham.
Malongesha aa ki nsapi mina idi mua kukufikisha bua wewa kumvua Mukenji wa Tshikondo tshia ndekelu, majingulula ne malongesha kudi muanetu William Marrion Branham bua ku longolola mukaji musela wa Mukalenga Wetu Yesu Kristo ne diambuimbua diende.
Tudi tunulomba nkonku inudi bua kuela, ngenyi ne menji binudi bua kufila bua ntungunukilu mulenga udi mwa kuyisha mudimu ewu kumpala.
Tusakidila bua masambila enu ne bua nyama inudi batutua ku mikolo bua ntungunukilu mulenga wa mudimu eu.
Mwanetu Billy DIABASENGA,
Mulombodi wa Tabernacle wa Réconciliation.

Bu muvuabu babanda bayidi ba Kristo ne: bavua batue tshimenga tshia Lomo kapia mu tshidimu tshia 64 ne bakine bantu, bavua babakengesha bikole. Bu wewe muena Kristo tshikondo atshi, uvua mua kuikala ukuatshibua ne ukengeshibua. Bavua mua kuikala basunsule bamue bena Kristo nebe kudi ny
... 
a malanda ebe nende tshinyi? Fila tshilejilu.
10 Paudi mu lutatu lukole, udi mua kudiumvua anu bu Paulo, udimona bu udi “mukana mua ntambue” anyi bu udi namu pabuipi menemene. Kudi bikondo bidi kueyemena Yehowa kuikale bualu bukole. Tshilejilu, ela meji ne: udi ulama muena mu dîku udi ne disama dia munanunanu. ...
a babedi bua kutantamena lutatu lua mushindu eu. Tangila Réveillez-vous ! wa dia 8/2/1994; wa dia 8/2/1997; wa dia 22/5/2000; ne wa dia 22/1/2001.

BENA LUBUKU LUA MITOTO BADI BALONDA MUTOTO BAYA KU YELUSHALEMA, PASHISHE BAYA KUDI YEZU
Bantu kampanda bavua bafumina ku Est. Mbena lubuku lua mitoto, mmumue ne: bantu batu balonga miaba idi mitoto muulu, bamba ne: padibu benza nanku badi mua kumvuija malu adi enzeka mu nsombelu ya bantu. (Yeshaya 47:13) Patshivuabu kuabu ku Est aku, bakamona mutoto kampanda uvua mutantshi wa kilometre nkama ya bungi ne bakawulonda, ki mbua kuya ku Beteleheme to, kadi mbua kuya ku Yelushalema.
Pakafika bena lubu
... 
to mu musokoko, kubambilaye ne: “Ndayi nukebe muana au bimpe menemene, panudi numupeta, nulue kummanyisha, bua meme panyi mmone mua kuya ne kumunemekela.” (Matayi 2:8) Kadi Helode uvua mu bulelela musue kumanya muaba uvua muana bua kumushipa!
Bena lubuku lua mitoto bamane kuya, bualu bua dikema buakenzeka. Mutoto uvuabu bamone pavuabu ku Est au wakapita kumpala kuabu. Bidi bimueneka patoke ne: eu ki mmutoto wetu wa tshianana eu to, kadi mbawutume anu bua ubalombole. Bena lubuku lua mitoto bakawu
...
 uvua mulombole bena lubuku lua mitoto abu? Vuluka ne: kawuvua mubalombole musangu umue ku Beteleheme kuvua Yezu to. Kadi wakabalombola ku Yelushalema kuakapetanganabu ne mukalenge Helode uvua musue kushipa Yezu. Helode uvua mua kuenza bualu ebu bu Nzambi kayi muelamu dîyi ne mudimuije bena lubuku lua mitoto abu bua kubenga kumuambila muaba uvua Yezu. Bidi bimueneka patoke ne: Satana, muena lukuna wa Nzambi uvua musue bua bashipe Yezu ke uvua mutume mutoto au bua kukumbaja tshivuaye mulongolole.

Lelo ke bakulombole’po kamwanda kafyame?— * Bible wisambila pa kifibwe kya pa bula kitwa bu “kifibwe kikola.” I kikola mwanda i kitambe kudi Leza. Kadi bekitanga bu kifibwe mwanda bantu kebādipo bekiyukile. Ne bamwikeulu nabo bādi basaka kwikiyuka. Le nobe ukimba uyuke kino kifibwe?—
Ulanga bamwikeulu badi basaka kuyuka bika?
Leza wāpangile mwana-mulume ne mwana-mukaji umbajinji ke padi myaka mivule. Majina abo i ba Adama ne Eva. Leza wēbapele kifuko kiyampe, ke budimi bwa Edena kadi. Shi ba Ada
... 
bana, baswile kwalamuna ntanda yonso ke paladisa’nka na mwādi mwikadile budimi bwa Edena. Badi ba kwikala nyeke mu Paladisa. Ino le uvulukile byālongele ba Adama ne Eva?—
Adama ne Eva bātombokēle Leza, o mwanda dyalelo ketudipo mu paladisa. Ino Leza wānene’mba ukalamuna ntanda yonso ikale miyampe, ne bantu bonso bakekale’mo nyeke ne nyeke kadi mu nsangaji. Le wadi wa kulonga kino namani? Mu bula bwa myaka mivule bantu kebādipo bekiyukile. Kyādi kifibwe.
Yesu paāile pano pa ntanda, wāfundije bant
...
a i kifibwe kya Bulopwe bwa Leza. Yesu wālombwele bantu balombele mwanda wa buno Bulopwe bwiye. Bukalamuna ntanda ke paladisa ya dyangi.
Le nobe usangedile kuyuka kino Kifibwe?— Yuka’mba enka boba bakōkela Yehova bo bakekala mu Paladisa. Bible witulombola mānga mivule ya bana-balume ne bana-bakaji bākōkele Yehova. Le ukimba kwibayuka?— Leka tukulombole’ko bamobamo, tuyuke ne mwa kwibewila.

“Tshiena ne bualu bua kulejila dianyisha kupita ebu: bua meme kumvua ne: bana banyi badi batungunuka ne kuenda mu bulelela.”—3 YONE 4.
MISAMBU: 88, 41
1, 2. a) Nnsombelu kayi udi bana ba bungi badi basombele mu ditunga dienyi batuilangana nende? b) Nnkonko kayi ituandamuna mu tshiena-bualu etshi?
JOSHUA udi wamba ne: “Katshia ku buana buanyi, mvua ngakula muakulu wa baledi banyi batuvua nabu ku babende kumbelu ne mu tshisumbu. Kadi pangakatuadija kalasa, ngakabanga kunanga muakulu wa muaba utuvu
... 
u bua kulonga malu a mu Bible lumingu luonso, badi kabidi dijinga ne mêba a bungi bua kumvuabu bulelela bua mu Bible bimpe. Kadi tshia kumanya tshidi ne: Bisangilu bidibu benza mu muakulu udi bana bumvua bimpe, bidi mua kubambuluisha anu bua dikalamu diabu patupu, pamuapa badi mua kulonga malu a bungi kupita mudi baledi bela meji. Kadi bana bobu kabayi bumvua muakulu au bimpe, kabiena mua kuenzeka nanku to. (Bala 1 Kolinto 14:9, 11.) Dîba adi nansha muakulu wa ku dibele wa muana kawakushala anu 
...
yi malanda a bana benu ne Yehowa kumpala kua majinga enu. Enzayi tshionso tshinudi mua kuenza bua ne: Dîyi dia Nzambi dilenge mioyo ya bana benu. Kanuambi ne: muanenu kakulua mutendeledi wa Yehowa to. Padi bana benu batumikila Dîyi dia Nzambi ne balonda tshilejilu tshienu tshimpe, nenudiumvue anu bu muvua mupostolo Yone mumvue bua bana bende ba mu tshimfuanyi ne: “Tshiena ne bualu bua kulejila dianyisha kupita ebu: bua meme kumvua ne: bana banyi badi batungunuka ne kuenda mu bulelela.”—3 Yone 4.

WEWE mubale tshikandakanda kayi tshionso, mutangile televizion anyi muteleje tshisanji, kudi anu malu a terorisme anyi tshinyangu, malu a mvita ne makuabu a tshikisu. Nansha wewe kabidi udi mua kuikala ne yebe ntatu. Tshilejilu, udi mua kuikala usama anyi mufuishe. Nunku, udi mua kudiumvua anu bu Yobo, wakafika too ne ku diamba ne: “makenga mmampite.”—Yobo 10:15, MMM.
Udi mua kudiebeja ne:
Bible udi wandamuna nkonko eyi bimpe.
‘Yeye neakupule tshinsonji tshionso ku mêsu kuabu; ne lufu kaluena lu
... 
antu to. Nzambi mmulaye bua kuenza malu aa. Bible udi umvuija mushindu waenzaye.
Kadi Bible udi utuambuluisha mu mishindu ya bungi. Udi mua kukuambuluisha bua kuikala ne nsombelu mulenga menemene nansha lelu’eu. Anji vulukabi ntatu ne makenga audi nawu. Tshilejilu, udi mua kuikala mupangile mfranga, udi ne bilumbu mu dîku, masama anyi madilu. Bible udi mua kukuleja mua kupita bimpe ne ntatu eyi ne udi mua kukuambuluisha bualu udi wandamuna bimpe nkonko bu mudi idi ilonda eyi:
Bu muudi ubala muka
...
Padibu bafila mvese mu mukanda eu, nomba wa kumpala udi ulua panyima pa dîna dia mukanda udi uleja nshapita ne udi ulonda udi uleja mvese. Tshilejilu: “2 Timote 3:16” udi umvuija mukanda muibidi wa Timote, nshapita 3, mvese wa 16.
Wewe ukeba mvese idibu bafile mu mukanda eu, newibidilangane ne Bible lukasa. Bua tshinyi kubenga mene kuenza programe wa kubala Bible dituku dionso? Wewe ubala nshapita isatu anyi itanu tshianana dituku dionso, udi mua kujikija kubala Bible mujima mu tshidimu tshimue.

MABEJI A TSHISANGILU TSHIA NSOMBELU NE MUDIMU WETU WA BUENA KRISTO Ngondo wa 7 2016
BIUMA BIA MU DÎYI DIA NZAMBI
Mmunyi muudi mua kuleja ne: udi weyemena Yehowa paudi usambila? Bua tshinyi mbimpe kusambila Nzambi bua mitshipu yetu? (Misambu 61-65)
TUIKALAYI NE NSOMBELU WA BUENA KRISTO
Kupepeja nsombelu webe kudi mua kukuambuluisha bua kuenza tshinyi? Mmunyi muudi mua kuidikija nsombelu wa Yezu?
BIUMA BIA MU DÎYI DIA NZAMBI
Tshisumi tshia Davidi bua Nzambi tshidi tshitulongesha tshinyi? Tshisumi tshietu tshidi tshitusaka ku dienza tshinyi? (Misambu 69-72)
TUIKALAYI NE NSOMBELU WA BUENA KRISTO
Bidi mua kukukemesha bua kumvua ne: nansha muntu yeye kayi ne dîba dia bungi anyi makanda makese udi mua kuikala mpanda-njila.
BIUMA BIA MU DÎYI DIA NZAMBI
Mufundi wa musambu wa 83 wakaleja ne: Yehowa Nzambi ke uvua muntu wa mushinga mukole kudiye. Mmunyi mutudi petu mua kuenza nanku?

Embrassade wa Suisse mu République démocratique du Congo mu dia 02 ngondo wa dikumi 2024, wakabanga dienza dia dilomba dia bansonga ba mu ditunga dia congo badi basue kupeta bourse wa Confédération suisse bua tshidimu tshia tulasa tshia 2025-2026.
Tshidimu tshionso, mbulamatadi wa mu Suisse utu upesha bantu bintu bia mushinga bidibu bapete mu malu a dienza makebulula ne a dienza mudimu wa biamu. Difila dia makuta edi didi dikankamija malu a bungenda a pa buloba bujima ne dienza bua matunga mapite pa 180 enze mudimu pamue ne Suisse.
Badi bafila makuta aa kudi Komite wa difutu bua balongi ba mu matunga makuabu (CFBE). Masomo a pa bula a mu Suisse adi’nka na befundi bapya batambile mu matanda makwabo badi na masomo a Master nansha a Doktere, ne bafundi ba matanda makwabo badi na masomo a Bachelor.
Dibikila edi nedifike ku ndekelu kua dituku dia 13 ngondo wa dikumi ne muibidi wa tshidimu atshi. Bua kumanya malu makuabu, udi mua kumonangana ne bena mbulamatadi ku: kinshasa@eda.admin.ch (e-mail) ne ku: 00243 89 89 46 800 (Telefone).

“Mushindu Kayi Unudi Numuteleja?,” Bua Dikankamika dia Bansonga, Ngondo Muisatu 2022.
Bishalangana ne diludika dimpa dia Nyuma wa Tshijila ditudi tupeta, ku diba ne diba, Nzambi udi ushindika ku bukola ne muntu yonsu wa kutudi ne mutumanya ne mutunanga. Pashisha, mu bikondo bietu bionsu bia dikenga, Musungidi udi utuvuluija mu meji etu muakenzaye.
Ela meji bua moyo weba. Mamanya a dibidila adi mua kufuma ku bikondo bidi bilamakaja moyo wetu anyi bidi bimueneka bua musangu wa kumpala bu bintu kab
... 
ndo ebi bisunguluka bia nyuma bidi bifika mu meba mashilangana ne mu mishindu mishilanga, bua muntu wa kutudi yonso.
Joseph Smith wakumvuija ne, misangu mikuabu tudi tupeta “ditapa disu pa tshikadi” ne mpukampuka dinyungana dimpa dia lungenyi.1
Mulombodi Mukulu Dallin H. Oaks, mu diandamuna kudi muntu mulelela uvua ushindika ne kena muanji kumona bintu bia nanku, wakamubela “Mpukampuka masambila eba akadi mandamuna misangu yabungi, kadi udi ukeba tshimanyinu tshinena anyi dîyi dikola ke paudi we
...
e diandamuna to.”2
Tuvua bateleja musangu mushala Mulombodi Mukulu Russell M. Nelson wamba ne: “Ndi nuela Iubila bua nuela meji bikola misangu yonsu pa lukonko elu: Mushindu kayi unudi Numuteleja? Ndi nuela Iubila bua nuangata tshitupa tshia kumuteja bimpa ne misangu yonsu.”3

MUKANDA WA KUMUDILU WA PETELO
JS Robertson
Table des matières :
Petelo wakadi mupostolo, nangananga kudi Bena Yuda, Paulo wakadi mupostolo kudi bisamba bia bende (Galatia 2:7,8). Diambedi Petelo kayi muanji kupidia Mukelenge Yesu misangu isatu, Mukelenge wakamuambila ne, “Simona, Simona, mona, Satana wakalomba mua kunuangata bualu bua kunusengeye bu ntete; kadi nakukulombela wewe Nzambi bua ditabuja diebe kadipangi; wewe, pawakudimuka, ukoleshe mitshima ya bana benu” (Luka 22:31,32).
Kunyima kua
... 
i wa mu malu a bantu bakuabo; kadi biakenga muntu bu muena Kilisto, kikadi biende ne bundu, kadi atumbishe biende Nzambi bua dina edi. 4:14-16
Bipendu bia bantu badi bapenda Kilisto nebipone pambidi bantu bende kabidi. Bikala bualu budi nunku, Nyuma wa butumbi ne Nyuma wa Nzambi udi unuikila pambidi pabo. Dina dia Kilisto didi dinene be, ba pa buloba kabena bajingulula ne, “Mu dina dia Yesu binu bionso nebitue panshi, ne bia bintu bia mu diulu ne bintu bia pa buloba ne bintu bia muinshi mua bulo
...
 bua Nzambi, bua dinanga diende, ne bua luse luende ne bua malu makuabo pamutu !
“Mose wakatupa mikenji, kadi ngasa ne bulelela biakafuma kudi Yesu Kilisto” (Yone 1:17 ).
“Nudi bamanye ngasa wa Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto ne, Yeye wakadi mubanji, kadi wakalua mupele bua bualu buenu, bua nuenu nulue babanji ku bupele buende” (2 Kolinto 8:9).
Tudiunde mu ngasa ne mu dimanya dia Yeye udi utunanga ne wakadifila bua bualu buetu.
Butumbi buikale kudiye katataka too ne ku dituku dia tshiendelele. Amen.

Alemanye, anyi République fédérale d'Allemagne, mmuaba wa ku Mputu wa pankatshi. Tshidi pankatshi pa Mbuu wa Baltique ne Mbuu wa ku Nord ku Nord ne mikuna ya Alpes ku Sud. Bungi bua bantu ba mu matunga 16 adi enza ditunga edi mbupite pa miliyo 82. Badi basombele mu tshitupa tshia kilometre 357.569 ne tshidi tshienza ditunga edi ditunga didi ne bantu ba bungi mu matunga a mu matunga a ku Mputu. Ku nord kudi ditunga dia Danemark, ku est kudi ditunga dia Pologne ne dia Tchéquie, ku sud kudi ditunga dia Autriche ne dia Suisse, ne ku ouest kudi ditunga dia France, dia Luxembourg, dia Belgique ne dia Pays-Bas. Mbanza munene wa ditunga edi ne udi ne bantu ba bungi mm tshimenga tshia Berlin ne tshimenga tshinene tshia malu a makuta ntshia Frankfurt; tshitupa tshinene tshia tshimenga tshidi ne bantu ba bungi ntshia Ruhr.

Kunanga Nzambi kudi kumvuija tshinyi?
Mmunyi mutudi mua kushala mu dinanga dia Nzambi?
Yehowa neapeshe bantu badi bashala mu dinanga diende tshinyi?
ELA meji ne: udi wenda mu njila dituku dia tshipepele tshikole. Diulu didi dienda difikuluka. Mipenya idi ituadija kuela, makubakuba atuta ne pashishe mvula mukole udi ubangisha. Udi utuadija kunyema, kuyi umona kua kubuela to. Pashishe, udi umona muaba muimpe kumpenga kua njila ne udi ubuelamu. Newanyishe muaba eu bikole, ki mmuomu anyi?
2 Tudi mu 
... 
 malu amue amue adi kaayi ne mushinga ne kaayi afumina mu mutshima patudi tusambila to. Tudi ne bua kuakula ne Yehowa anu bu mutu muana wakula ne tatuende udiye munange bikole. Tudi ne bua kumuleja malu onso patoke ne kanemu ne kuakula ne muoyo mujima. (Musambu 62:8) Eyowa, didilongela Bible ne masambila menza ne muoyo umue mmalu a mu ntendelelu wetu adi atuambuluisha bua kushala mu dinanga dia Nzambi.
WIKALE NE DISANKA MU NTENDELELU WEBE

...
umona mudimu wa kuyisha Bukalenge bu diakalenga dinene ne bu tshintu tshia mushinga mukole?

18. Bua tshinyi tudi ne bua kutendelela pamue ne bena Kristo balelela?
19. Mmunyi mutudi mua kukolesha dinanga mu tshisumbu tshia bena Kristo?

22. Mmushindu kayi uudi mua ‘kulamata muoyo wa bushuwa’?
23. Bua tshinyi bidi bikengela kushala mu dinanga dia Nzambi?

PAVUA bena Isalele bumbuke mu Babulona mu 537 kumpala kua Yezu, Yehowa wakaditatshisha bikole bua dipingana diabu mu Yelushalema. Wakabambila ne: ‘Longoluelayi bantu njila; elayi, elayi mabula mu tshibeba, umbushayimu mabue.’ (Yesh. 62:10) Ntshinyi tshivuabu mua kuenza bua kutumikila mukenji eu? Bamue bena Isalele bakaya kumpala kua bana babu bua kulongolola njila, pamuapa bajibikila bina ne babatamija njila. Kakuyi mpata, bualu ebu buakambuluisha bana babu bavua babalonda bua kupinganabu bimpe 
... 
ua munayi munene, uvua mua kupeta bubanji ne lumu. Kadi wakajingulula muvua mêyi a mu Bible aa malelela: ‘Biuma bia muntu mubanji bidi musoko wende wa ngumbu, bidi bu lumbu lule mu meji ende.’ (Nsu. 18:11) Eyowa, bukubi budi muntu mua kumona bu mupetele ku bubanji budi anu bua mu tshingenyingenyi patupu. Kabidi, aba badi bipatshila bubanji ne muoyo mujima batu anu ‘badisunsula mubidi mujima ne tunyinganyinga tua bungi.’—1 Tim. 6:9, 10.
Bia disanka, bansonga ba bungi mbapete disanka ne bukubi bid
...
2:10. Bamue bena Yuda bavua mua kuikala benze mudimu mukole bua kulandakaja ne kutokesha njila wa kupinganyina kuabu bua bantu ba Nzambi bafike kuvuabu baya. Biwikala udienzeja bua kukumbaja bipatshila kampanda mu mudimu wa tshijila, kutshioki to. Nzambi yeye mukuambuluishe, udi pebe mua kukumbaja bipatshila ebi. Tungunuka ne kulomba Yehowa meji paudi udienzeja bua kumbusha bipumbishi bidi kumpala kuebe. Bushuwa, udi mua kumona mudiye ukuambuluisha bua ‘kubatamijila makasa ebe njila.’—Nsu. 4:26.

1. Nnganyi uvua mutupeshe muoyo?
YEHOWA “udi Nzambi wa muoyo.” (Yelemiya 10:10) Mmufuki wetu, ne yeye ke udi mutupeshe muoyo. Bible udi wamba ne: “Wakafuka bintu bionso, ne bua disua diebe biakikalaku ne biakafukibua.” (Buakabuluibua 4:11) Eyowa, Yehowa uvua musue tuikale ne muoyo. Muoyo ndipa dia mushinga mukole didiye mutupeshe.—Bala Misambu 36:9.
2. Tudi ne bua kuenza tshinyi bua kuikala ne diakalenga?
2 Yehowa udi utupesha bionso bitudi nabi dijinga bua tuikale ne muoyo, bu mudi biakudia ne 
... 
 tshivua Yehowa mubakandike bua kudia. Wakamba ne: “Kadi kanuena ne bua kudia munyinyi ne muoyo wawu, mmumue ne: mashi awu to.”—Genese 1:29; 9:3, 4.
11. Mmukenji kayi uvua Nzambi muelele tshisamba tshia Isalele bua mashi?
11 Bidimu bitue ku 800 Yehowa mumane kukandika Noa bua kudia mashi, wakelela kabidi tshisamba tshiende mukenji ne: “Bikala muena Isalele anyi muntu kampanda wa ku babende udi musombele munkatshi muenu ulemba nyama ne udi ukuata nyama wa tshisuku anyi nyunyi udibu mua kudia, udi
...
u ne: bobu bitabuje Yezu, badi mua kupeta muoyo wa tshiendelele. Tudi banange bantu, ne netuenze muetu muonso bua kubaleja mudibu mua kupeta muoyo. (Yehezekele 3:17-21) Dîba adi, netuambe anu bu mupostolo Paulo ne: “Tshiena ne dibanza dia mashi a muntu nansha umue, bualu tshiena mudikande bua kunuambila malu onso adi Nzambi mupangadije.” (Bienzedi 20:26, 27) Bushuwa, tudi tuleja mutudi tunemeka muoyo ne mashi bikole patudi tuambila bantu bakuabu malu a Yehowa ne mudiye wangata muoyo ne mushinga.

Kaya Kudi Yesu
Kuya Kudi Yesu
MEYI A KUMPALA
Tshiena bualu tshia mukanda eu tshidi dilondangana dijima dia malu. Ke anu batangile kudi Yesu, udi ne bukole bua kuandamuna ku majinga a mutshima, kudibo ne bua kuya kudi aba bonso badi bakeba “Njila wa ditalala” anyi? Mulunda wa bantu badi nealombole tshidia ku tshidia, mu njila wa bulelela, eu udi ne nzala ne nyota ya buakane, udi umuteka mu masanka adi alu ku didifila dijima ku mudimu wende. KKY iii.1
Bantu ba bungi badi batatshishibue nebasangane mu mabeji aa kukoleshibua ne ditekemena kabidi nebatungunuke mu muoyo wa ha buloba bikale ne didifila dikole hamue ne disanka kadiyi ne ndekelu. KKY iii.2
Yokobo, hakanyemaye muan'abo wakalala butuku mu mpata, muteke dibue bu musamu ku mutu wende. Munkatshi mua tulu tuende, wakamona mu tshilota tshibandilu tshile ne lusongo luatshi luakadi lutue mu diulu, wakakolesha muoyo, muitabije ne buobumue buakadi buhehele hankatshi ha buloba ne muaba wa basangale. Tshikenakumona etshi tshiule tente ne milayi tshimueneka kabidi kudi aba bonso badi ne nzala ya kumanya disua dia Nzambi! KKY iii.3
Mukanda eu udi mukudimunyibue mu miakulu ya bungi. Tudi tujinga ne, Difunda dihia-dihia edi dikuba bimpe, ditungunuje mudimu wa disanka wa yakadianjila diambedi. KKY iii.4
Kakuena dinanga didi ditambe edi,
dia muntu udi ufuila balunda bandi. Yone 15:13.

Mulombodi wa malu a disangila, dîku ne bana, Mulombodi Mireille Masangu Bibi Muloko wakenza muyuki mu Dibidi dia 2 ngondo muitanu mu biro biende ne tshisumbu tshia bantu ba mu komite wa ditunga wa bakaji ne diambuluishangana bavua balue kumuleja malu adi mu mukanda wende wa dimanyisha bua kuluisha dibaka dia bana mu RDC bua bamanyishi aba badi balue kumulombaye. Mushindu eu udi umvuija mushindu udiye wenza malu bilondeshile mmuenenu wa mfumu wa ditunga bua dibaka dia bana mu ditunga dia Congo.
“
... 
enji ya ditunga dietu ne mikenji mikuabu idi ikokesha ne bidi kabidi binyanga mushindu udi muana umueneka anyi ukola. Nudi mua kumona ne: padi bansonga kabayi badilongolole, padi bansonga bapangila mushindu wa kuenza malu, ndelanganyi yonso idi ipangila mushindu wa kuenza malu ne ditunga didi kadiyi mua kukola to. Ke bualu kayi, ku diambuluisha dia mukanda eu tudi tuenza malu a kulomba bamfumu bua badiangatshile mudimu ne nangananga bua mudimu wa dilombola dia bana, mbuena kuamba ne: mudimu wetu
...
ia 60 tshia bena ministre, mfumu wa ditunga uvua mushindike bua kuluisha dibaka dia bana. Ke bualu kayi tuvua tufila ngenyi ya mua kusumba ne kutangalaja programe wa ditunga wa diluisha dibaka dia bana”.
Mulombodi wa malu a disangila dia bana, dîku ne bana Mireille Masangu Bibi Muloko wakanyisha mudimu udi komite wa dilonga wa CONAFED wenza bua kuluisha dibaka dia bana ne wakafila mibelu bua mudimu eu wikale ne diakalengele mu ditunga dia République démocratique du Congo.
Shekinah Gloire Kabongo
