MUPROFETE Danyele uvua ne muoyo bidimu bipite pa 500 kumpala kua Yezu kuledibuaye. Nansha nanku, Yehowa wakamanyisha Danyele malu avua mua kuleja dîba divua Yezu ne bua kuedibua manyi a nyuma peshi kutekibua Masiya anyi Kristo. Wakamuambila ne: ‘Umanye, ujingulule ne: Dîba diakapatuka mukenji ne: Bapingaje bantu mu Yelushalema ne base musoko tshiakabidi, too ne ku difika dia muntu muedibue manyi pa mutu [anyi Masiya], mukokeshi mene, mbingu muanda mutekete neyipite ne mbingu makumi asambombo ne 
... 
uende tshivua tshia 455 K.B.B. Tudi bamanye mpindieu ne: mulayi wa Danyele uvua ne bua kutuadija mu 455 K.B.B
Danyele udi uleja mutantshi wikala tshikondo tshidi tshifikisha kudi ‘Masiya Mukokeshi’ ne bua kunenga. Udi wakula bua ‘mbingu muanda mutekete ne mbingu makumi asambombo ne ibidi,’ bungi busanga bua mbingu 69. Tshikondo etshi tshivua mua kunenga mutantshi bule kayi? Bible ya bungi idi ileja ne: eyi ki mmbingu ya matuku muanda mutekete to, kadi mmbingu ya bidimu. Mbuena kuamba ne: lumingu
...
imu tshia 1 K.B.B. too ne ku tshia 1 B.B., tudi ne tshidimu tshimue (bualu kakuvua tshidimu tshia tshijengu to). Kumukila mu 1 B.B. too ne mu 29 B.B. tudi ne bidimu 28. Patudi tusangisha bipeta bisatu ebi tudi tupeta bidimu 483. ‘Bakashipa’ Yezu mu 33 B.B., munkatshi mua lumingu lua 70 lua bidimu. (Danyele 9:24, 26) Bala mukanda wa Tutumayi ntema ku mulayi wa Danyele! nshapita wa 11, ne wa Étude perspicace des écritures, Volime 2, dibeji dia 995-999. Yonso ibidi mmipatula kudi Bantemu ba Yehowa.

TSHIBUMBA TSHIA NSENTEDI
TSHIBUMBA TSHIA NSENTEDI (dibeji dia ndekelu)
Lukonko: Tangila lukonko elu ne amue mandamuna atu bantu batamba kufila. [Bala lukonko lua kumpala ne mandamuna adibu bafile.] Wewe udi mua kuandamuna bishi?
Mvese: Mat 4:1-4
Difila: Bu muvua Diabolo muyukile ne Yezu ne mumutete, nanku Diabolo ki mbubi to, kadi mmuntu wetu mulelela eu. Ntshinyi tshikuabu tshidi Bible wamba bua Diabolo? Tshiena-bualu etshi tshidi tshiumvuija malu makuabu.
DIBEJI DIA DIBIKILA BUA TSHIVULUKILU
Difila: Tudi tuenda tufila dibeji dia dibikila edi bua tshibilu tshia mushinga mukole. [Pesha muntu dibeji dia dibikila.] Mu dia 23 ngondo muisatu, bantu miliyo ya bungi pa buloba bujima nebadisangishe bua kuvuluka lufu lua Yezu Kristo ne kuteleja muyuki wa malu a mu Bible udi uleja mudi lufu luende lutuambuluisha. Kabakufutshisha makuta to. Dibeji dia dibikila edi didi dileja dîba ne muaba wikala tshibilu etshi mua kuenzeka mu bitupa bietu ebi. Tudi tukulomba bua ulue wewe ne mushindu.
FUNDA TSHIEBE TSHIA KUAMBA
Lukonko:
Mvese:
Difila:

“Ndi [ne] . . . meji a ditalala, ki nga dikenga to, bua kunupesha matuku atshilualua mimpe ne ditekemena.”—Yelemiya 29:11.
“DITEKEMENA DIDI . . . NE MUSHINGA MU NSOMBELU WETU WA MU NYUMA.” Ke tshivuabu bambe mu umue mukanda. Udi wamba kabidi ne: “Diodi ke buanga buimpe bua kutshimuna nabu dishikila, didiumvua kule ne bakuabu, ne buôwa.”—Hope in the Age of Anxiety.
Bible udi uleja mutudi dijinga ne ditekemena, udi utudimuija kabidi bua kudimukila ditekemena dia dishima. Udi wamba mu Misambu 146:3
... 
ukua bantu, bisamba, ne bisumbu bia miakulu bimuenzele bionso mudimu. Bukokeshi buende mbukokeshi bua tshiendelele buikala kabuyi mua kupita, ne bukalenge buende kabuakubutudibua to.’—Danyele 7:14.
Tshidi tshitujadikila ne: malu aa neakumbane ntshinyi? Pavua Yezu pa buloba, wakaleja muvuaye mukumbane bua kuikala Mukalenge uvua Nzambi musungule. Uvua wondopa babedi, udisha bapele, ubisha ne bafue. Malongesha ende ke avua nangananga ne mushinga, bualu avua ne mêyi manene ikala mua kuambuluisha ban
...
bua malu enzeka matuku a ku nshinkidilu, wakajadika kabidi wamba ne: “Nebayishe lumu luimpe elu lua Bukalenge pa buloba bujima budi bantu basombele bua luikale bujadiki kudi bisamba bionso, ne pashishe, nshikidilu nealue.”—Matayi 24:14.
Lumu luimpe alu ludi ludimuija benji ba malu mabi ne lupesha bantu bakane ditekemena, lubajadikila ne: bakadi pa kudimuena masanka adibu babalaye. Udi musue kumanya malu a bungi bua masanka aa anyi? Biobi nanku, ndaku mu dibeji dia ndekelu dia tshibejibeji etshi.

Batemwe ba Yehowa be na programe a kulonga na bantu Bible alulula nkonko ibungi, bu kileshesho:
- Efile Mukulu nnanyi?
- Efile Mukulu etatshishaa bwande su?
- Mushindo kinyi wandi mulombeene kulongamisha dibaka dyande?
- Mushindo kinyi wandi mulombeene kupeta muloo mu muwa wande?
Pano okyebe kupeta myaluulo ku nkonko ayelaa bantu bebungi pabitale programe etu a kulonga na bantu Bible.
Kuno kulonga akukitshikaa mushindo kinyi? Atwata kina mwanda bu shi “Efile Mukulu” sunga “dibaka” na atutaluula 
... 
epatuule aye nabeene.
Bwa kwitukwasha bwa kulonga Bible kalolo, twi na mukanda wa A nkinyi akilongyesha namu Bible? Uno mukanda aulesha kalolo, akilongyesha Bible pabitale Efile Mukulu, Yesu, nshalelo etu a mafuku e kumpala na ingi myanda.
Abitungu kufuta makuta bungi kinyi bwa kulonga Bible? Kulonga kwi buntu, tabitungu kufuta bwa kulonga nya.
Kulonga akwikala akwata nsaa bungi kinyi? Bantu bebungi abataa nsaa umune ku lubingo sunga kukila bwa kulonga Bible netu. Bungi bwa nsaa ya kulonga mbuta
...
alo na mu nsaa yokumina. Munda mwa minite ipeela akyebe nkulesha mushindo watulongaa Bible na bantu. Su bokumina, nwi balombeene kutungunuka na kulonga.
Su nankumina kulonga Bible, abitungu shi nfikye bu Temwe a Yehowa? Nya. Batemwe ba Yehowa abakuminaa kulonga na bantu Bible, kadi tatutumaa bantu pa bukopo bwashi bekale Batemwe ba Yehowa nya. Anka, atuleshaa bantu na kanemo kooso akilongyesha Bible, atuuku shi muntu na muntu e na kya kwata kitshibilo pabitale myanda ya lukumino.—1 Mpyeele 3:15.

Mishue eshi-uapatakanit
Le Rythme nashamu eshi-natuenitamakut katauapekaitsheshiniti / kanikamushiniti / ka tutaminiti nikamunnu / ka nikamuniti kutaka auennua unikamunnu 18 nuash 30 etatupipuneshiniti e nashakanit tshe ishpaniuet ne atusseun tshe itutikuht nuash tshetshi tutuaht utekanepimuaua mamu.
Namaieu ka kuetshipashtautinanut auen eshi-pikutat eiteueitshenannu, Apu takuak anite tshetshi auen ashanakanit. Naushunakanuat anitshenat anite ka tshitshipannannu ka taht tshetshi petuakanniti. Minakanuat tshetshi tshitshipanitishuht, tshika mishta-tshishkutamuakanuat tshetshi ut uapatahk ishpish tshi ituteht mak tshetshi tutuakaniht anu kataku tshetshi ituteht e uitshikuht nenua ka nishtuapataminiti atusseunnu ne eiteueitshenanut mak minuashit tshekuan e uitakanit.
Tutakanu tshetshi ut tshitutenanut mak tshetshi tutakanit tshekuan : atusseun anu etenitakuak mak at tshetshi tshitapatakanit ne tshekuan pemipanit anite katshitapatakanit. Rythme utei eukuannu tshetshi tutaminit kie anu kataku ituteniti auennua.

Adama muntu wa kumpala wakapingana ku buloba pakafuaye. (Genese 2:7; 3:19) Bia muomumue, bantu bakuabu bonso badi afua aba badi bapingana ku buloba.—Muambi 3:19, 20.
Bantu badi bafue mbabingishibue ne mbafuidibue luse bua mibi yabu. (Lomo 6:7) Nunku kakuena dinyoka dia bubi pakadi muntu mumane kufua to.
Bafue badiku mua kupetulula kabidi muoyo anyi?

TSHIDI BIBLE WAMBA
“Nekuikale dibika dia ku lufu.”—Bienzedi 24:15.
MMALU KAYI MAKUABU ATUDI MUA KULONGA MU BIBLE?
Bible utu misangu ya bungi ufuanyikija lufu ne tulu. (Yone 11:11-14) Nzambi udi mua kubisha bafue anu mutudi mua kubisha muntu udi mulale tulu.—Yobo 14:13-15.
Bible udi utela ndambu wa bantu badibu babishe ku lufu, bijadiki bidi bitusaka bua kuitabuja ne dishindika dionso ne: bafue nebabike.—1 Bakelenge 17:17-24; Luka 7:11-17; Yone 11:39-44.

- Beni: Ku Nord Kivu : ba FARDC badi bafila amua mapangadika bua dikuba dia bimenga binena bidi mu territoire wa Beni
- Goma:Ku Goma, bena societe civile batua ku lukama ne baleji mpala ba bisamba bishila shilangana badi balomba dilongolola dia muyiki munena muimikila malu a bukubi ku nord kivu .
- Kalemie:diba ndikumbana bua se baluma ba mvita ba Twa ne ba éléments ne mua kuteka bingoma panshi bua kubueja ditalala mu province wa Tanganyika.
- Kisangani:Mu Province wa Tshopo, baleinière umua uvua mudina mu fleuve Congo mu localité Bandu pabuipi ne cité wa Basoko.
- Mbuji Mayi: ku mbuji mayi , mishanga ya bia kudia mipueka bikola mu bisalu . bantu badi bansaka bua musangu wa kumpala wikalabu ne mua kupitshisha bibilu bia ndekelu wa tshidimu mu disanka .
- Kinshasa:Mu tshimenga tshia A Kinshasa, nsombelu kena muimpa to mu nzubu ya mashika ya disumbisha dia bimpa . kakuena bantu ba bungi to badi balua bua kusumba bintu to mu tshikondu etshi tshia bibilu .

Diunvuija Ku dituku dia
Dipungila Dipia-dipia
2 YONE
Kunyima kua mumane kulesha mu mukanda wende wa kumudilu ngadilu yonso wa bualu bulelela, mupostolo mu mikanda mikuabu ibidi udi utulesha dilongesha edi dilelela « mu kuenda ». Ne kena usungula apa tatu mu ditabusha (1 Yone 2. 13) kadi mukashi muena kilisto ne bana bandi, badi bakuabu babu, bikale disanka diende dinene bualu wakabasangana benda mu bushua. Nsonga, nuenu bena kilisto, numanye ne kakuena bualu budi butamba kusankisha badi banunange, anu bua kunusangana ne kunumona nuenda mu dilongesha dia Dî dia Nzambi
(nv. 4 ; 3 Yone 4).
Luendu lua bana ludi tshileshelu ne diku dia bena kuitabusha didi dilombodibue kudi Dî dia bushua. Mu tshikondo tshidi malu onso manyanguke, diku didi tshitupa tshia ndekelu tshidi muana mua kudiunda mutapuluke ne bukoya buonso bua pa buloba. Kadi bidi bilua ne, bulelela budi bupumbishibue kudi bena lukuna ba pa mbelu (mv. 10 ; Bienz. 20. 30). Dinanga dilelela, didi ditupesha dibanza dia tuetu kubenga kuakidila bantu ba mushindu eu. Netuitabushe muenyi udi ulua kutuambila dishima ku bualu bua muntu udi ne mushinga munene kutudi anyi ? Ne nganyi mukuabu udi ne mushinga munene kutudi bikala ke Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto ? Muena kilisto mukashi, muana mukese mu ditabusha badi ne bukole, ke bua kuyukila ne bantu aba, kadi… bua kubinshidila tshibi bua kababuedi. Dilongesha dilelela didi bubanshi buetu bunene. Katudipangi nansha ! (Nsum. 23. 23).

Kawena ne dibuluibua nansha dimue dia pa buadi. Kadi udi ulesha diteka dia mu tshienzedi kudi Paulo ne bena mudimu nandi ba misengelelu itudi tusangana mu mukanda eu. Wakafundila bena Kolosai ne : « Nunku bu munudi bantu basungula kudi Nzambi, ba tshijila ne bananga, luatai mutshima wa luse, ne dikuatshisha, ne wa
... 
 Mako 10. 5). Kadi ngasa kudi mupostolo udi ubala ngasa umue eu udi ukuata mudimu mu mutshima wa filemona. Paulo udi mumanye bimpe dinanga dia Filemona bua bansantu buonso (mv. 5) ne bileshelu biakadi dinanga edi dilesha (mv. 7).
Onesimo udi unvuisha ne « mukumbane ». Ku mpala wakadi mupika wa tshianana, katataka udi mukumbanyina dina diende (mv. 11). Kutamba abi, wakalua muan’abu wa lulamatu ne munangibue (mv. 16 ; Kol. 4. 9). Kakuena dina dikuabu didi ne mushinga anu dia muan’etu ne didi dikum
...
boka, ne kupingashibua kudi Mfumu wetu. Ke bua tuetu kabidi kupingashibua mu ngikadilu wa bupika kabidi, kadi bu aba badiye ubikila ne bana babu bananga (fuany. mv. 16 ne Yone 15. 15). Ne Paulo apa udi tshimfuanyikishi tshia Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto, udi ufuta dibanza dietu (mv. 17-19). Mukanda eu utamba kulongesha bua kubuesha mu muoyo wetu wa matuku onso, buena kilisto budi mu tshienzedi : kudipidia kuetu nkayetu, buimpe, kudipuekesha, ngasa… mu tshikoso, tshimuenenu tshivula tshia dinanga.

Mu ditunga dia Brésil mu tshimenga tshia Belém, M. Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan, ministre wa Indonésie wa malu a luibaku ne a mâyi, kunyima kua muyuki wende ne mfumu wa ditunga Félix Tshisekedi. Tshivua tshienzeke mu mpungilu wa mu tshibandabanda tshia mâyi a Amazone uvua mulombodi wa ditunga ubuela.
Mpuilu eu uvua musangisha mfumu wa ditunga dia Congo, mfumu wa ditunga dia Brésil Lula da Silva bua mâyi a Amazone ne mulombodi wa ditunga dia Indonésie, Joko Widodo, bua mâyi a Borneo-Mékong.
Mulombodi 
... 
te, bua kuenza mudimu pamue bua kulama mitshi ya mvula idibu babikila ne: bipupa bia bantu, ne dia kukeba tshia kupingajila bantu babu.
Bu mudi malu a ditunga dia Congo, dia Brésil ne dia Indonésie mashilangane nunku, malu aa nealongolole mushindu wa kuenza malu mu diumvuangana bua kubenga kuenza malu mu bulongame bua kuditatshisha bua diakalenga dia bukua bantu ne dia bantu babu. “G3 ya malu a mashintuluka a nsombelu” idi kabidi ne tshipatshila tshia kukepesha bupele ne kuakaja nsombelu wa bant
...
 dia RDC. Bu mudi mâyi a Amazone enda avulangana ne lukasa luonso, mâyi aa ke adi mua kuikala pa muaba wa kumpala.
Tshisekedi wakayukila kabidi ne ministre wa ditunga ne wa malu a bende wa ditunga dia Émirats arabes unis, Cheikh Abdallah ben Zayed Al Nahyane, bua mudimu wa kuibaka tshitudilu tshia mazuwa a mu mâyi a muinshi mu buloba bua Banana. Mulombodi wa ditunga dia Émirats wa mu Amerike wa ku Nord wakajadika ne: ditunga diende divua ne bua kukumbaja mudimu munene eu.

... 
impe. Kadi bana ba Eli bavua bobu benzaku malu mabi matambe! Samuele uvua umona bionso bivuabu benza abi. Yeye pende uvuaku muenze malu mabi bu bana ba Eli anyi?— Tòo! Yeye wakatungunuka ne kuenza malu makane anu muvua baledi bende bamulongeshe.
Ambaku pebe: tshivua Eli ne bua kuikala muenzele bana bende babidi abu ntshinyi?— Si uvua ne bua kubanyoka. Kavua mua kubalekela batungunuka ne kuenza kabidi mudimu ku nzubu wa Nzambi to! Kadi Eli yeye kakabenzela nanku to, ke pakamufikila Yehowa munda, 
...
uele kumanyishaye Eli mukenji eu anyi?— Tòo, kabivua bipepele to. Kadi nansha muvua Samuele ne buôwa, wakenza tshivua Nzambi mumuambile bua kuenza. Mêyi a Yehowa au akakumbana. Bakashipa bana babidi ba Eli abu, Eli kufua pende.
Samuele udi tshilejilu tshimpe kutudi. Wakenza yeye malu avua makane nansha muvuaye umona bantu bakuabu benza malu mabi. Kadi wewe, newenze pebe bishi? Newikale bu Samuele, utungunuka ne kuenza malu makane anyi? Wewe muenze nanku, neusankishe Yehowa ne baledi bebe kabidi.

Mu Tshiluba batu bamba ne: “Kusomba makuta nkutekete, kadi kuafuta nkukole.”
MÊYI aa mmamanyike bikole mu Afrike ne adi aleja mutu bantu ba bungi badiumvua pa buloba bujima. Ke muudi udiumvua pebe paudi usomba makuta kudi mulunda webe anyi kudi muntu kampanda anyi? Nansha mudi kusomba makuta mua kumueneka kuimpe imue misangu, ndungenyi luimpe anyi? Njiwu kayi anyi ndutatu kayi ludi mua kumueneka mu disomba dia makuta?
Lusumuinu kampanda lua mu Tshiluba ludi luleja muji wa bualu luamba ne: “Maban
... 
ua tshimpitshimpi ne muntu kayi ne tshikuabu tshia kuenza. Nansha nanku, muntu yeye muangate dipangadika dia kusomba, udi ne bua kuleja mudiye wenza malu ne bululame. Mmunyi mudiye mua kuenza nanku?
Tshia kumpala, kukebi bua kusomba makuta bua kumuenena muntu bualu udi ne makuta a bungi anyi bintu bia bungi to. Katuena ne bua kuela meji ne: bu mudi muntu ne makuta a bungi udi utusombeshawu bua kutuambuluisha to. Anyi kuela meji ne: katuena benzejibue bua kuenza malu ne bululame kumpala kua muntu
...
ngu luabu alu. Bivua bibangate bidimu bibidi bua bujitu ebu kumbukabu pambidi pabu. Bena dibaka aba mbapete dilongesha kayi mu bualu ebu? Bavua bambe ne: “kuikala ne mmuenenu wa mu nyuma bua bintu bia ku mubidi mbukubi.”
Bantu ba bungi mbamanye mêyi a mu Tshiluba atuvua batele kuulu eku. Kadi ki mmabapangishe bua kusombangana makuta to. Ku diambuluisha dia mibelu ya mu Bible itudi bakonkonone kuulu eku, ki mbimpe bua kuela meji ne kudiebeja ne muoyo mujima bua ne: Ndi ne bua kusomba makuta anyi?

TSHIMVUA KALE:
Mvua mukolele mu Rmaysh, ku mikalu idi pankatshi pa Isalele ne Lebanona mu bikondo bia mvita. Ndi mvuluka muvua bingoma binene bitayike, kukosabi bantu bavua kabayi ne tshilumbu bimue bitupa bia mubidi. Nsombelu uvua mukole, ne malu a tshikisu ne buntomboji biakavulangana.
Dîku dietu divua mu tshimue tshia ku bitendelelu bia Katolike bivua ku Est tshivuabu babikila ne: Maronite. Papa uvua wenza mudi
... 
yabu. Bobu kungumvuija mudi Satana Diabolo muikale mukebeshi munene wa malu mabi onso aa. (Buakabuluibua 12:12) Bivua binkemeshe bua kumona lutulu ne dituishibua bivua nabi Bantemu. Bivua bindenge ku muoyo pavuabu bandongeshe ne: Nzambi uvua ne dîna. (Musambu 83:18) Bakandeja kabidi 1 Timote 4:8 udi wamba ne: “Dibidija dia mubidi didi ne mushinga mu malu makese; kadi dilamata Nzambi didi ne mushinga mu malu onso, bualu didi ne mulayi wa muoyo wa mpindieu ne utshilualua.” Mêyi aa avua ne buenzeji
...
u dîba. Katshia ku 2000, meme ne Anita tudi basombele mu Eskilstuna, mu ditunga dia Suède, mutudi tulonga Bible ne bantu badi bakula tshiena Arabe.
Mutshima wanyi utshidi anu unyingalala bua bantu badi bakenga bua malu a tshikisu. Kadi kumanya bua tshinyi malu aa adi enzeka, ne kumanya ne: mu katupa kîpi emu Nzambi neajikije malu aa, kudi kumpesha disanka dilelela ne ditalala.—Musambu 37:29.
Meme ne mukajanyi tutu ne disanka dia bungi mu buambi. Tudi basue bikole kulongesha bakuabu malu a Yehowa

Mfumu wa ditunga udi ujinga kupesha kabadi kakulu ka dilumbuluisha miaba ya mudimu idi mua kukambuluisha bua kukumbajaye mudimu wende wa kulumbuluisha mikenji ya ditunga bimpe. Mudimu eu uvua wenzeka ne makuta a mbulamatadi wa ditunga dia Congo (bungi buawu 65%) ne a kudi Programe wa bulongolodi bua matunga masanga bua didiunda (bungi buawu 35%) ne uvua ne bua kuenza ngondo mitue ku 8 anyi 10.
Nzubu eu udi mu muaba udi njila ya Kauka ne Kalume misambakaja, mu quartier Royal, mu tshimenga tshia La Gombe. Tshimanu etshi netshikale tshienza bu piramide tshienza ne tshiamu tshia mpolondo tshia Nyiragongo. ⁇ Pakasungulabu nzubu eu, tuvua basue kutumbisha muaba udi buloba buenza ne mikuna mu ditunga dietu ne kuleja mudi mapangadika a Kabadi ka manême a bantu ka mu ditunga adi masunguluke. ⁇
Muakuidi munene Dieudonné Kamuleta, mulombodi wa Kabadi ka malu a ditunga, wakela Mfumu wa ditunga tuasakidila bua mushindu uvuaye muambuluishe bua kuibaka nzubu eu.
Kabadi ka malu a ditunga ka mu ditunga dia Congo kadi ku mutu kua mbulamatadi ya ditunga dia congo pamue ne Kabadi ka malu a mikenji ne Kabadi ka malu a mbulamatadi. Bu muvua Kabadi kakulu ka manême a bantu kapanduluke panyima pa dikudimuna dia mbulamatadi wa dilumbuluisha, kabadi aka kadi ne bukokeshi bua kulumbuluisha bilondeshile mikenji ya ditunga ne mapangadika aka kaena mua kushintuluka to. Anu Kabadi aka ke kadi mua kulumbuluisha Mfumu wa ditunga ne wa mbulamatadi.
Shekinah Gloire kabongo

Samantha wa mu Afrique du Sud udi wamba ne: “Kutu anu imue nsombelu mikole itu ikengela bua muntu apange bululame ndambu.”
Udiku witaba bualu ebu anyi? Anu bu Samantha, bonso buetu tukadi bapete nsombelu mikole dituku kampanda anyi kansanga. Mushindu utudi tuenza malu patudi mu nsombelu idi itusaka bua kupanga bululame udi mua kuleja malu atudi tuanganta ne mushinga. Tshilejilu, tuetu tumona lumu lutudi nalu bu ludi ne mushinga wa bungi kupita malu makuabu onso, tudi mua kumona dipanga bululame 
... 
i beyemenangana badi badimona mu bukubi. Kadi bantu kabatu beyemenangana musangu umue to. Batu beyemenangana patubu bapitshisha dîba dia bungi kaba kamue, bambilangana malu patoke ne benza malu kabayi batangila anu diakalenga diabu. Kadi muntu yeye muenze bualu nansha bumue budi kabuyi bululame, kabakumueyemena kabidi to. Ne pakadibu kabatshiyi bakueyemena, mbikole menemene bua kulua kukueyemenabu kabidi.
Bakadiku bakuele mâyi ku makasa kudi muntu uuvua umona bu mulunda muimpe anyi? Biobi nanku,
...
shi wa malu a mpetu mu Iniversite wa mu Californie muenze dilonga kampanda wakamona ne: “Dipanga bululame ditu ne tshiambu.” Nunku tudi mua kudifuanyikija ne kishi ka disama, mumue ne: wewe utamba kusomba ne muntu udi kayi ne bululame, udi mu njiwu minene ya “kuikala” pebe wenza malu ne dipanga bululame.
Ntshinyi tshiudi mua kuenza bua kubenga kukuluka mu buteyi bua dipanga bululame? Bible udi mua kukuambuluisha. Suaku ukonkonone amue mêyi manene a mu Bible adi mu tshiena-bualu tshidi tshilonda.

... 
mudimu wende wa diyisha bikole!

Pavua bakokeshi batete bua kubakandika, bana betu bakaya ku kabadi ne kutshimunabu bilumbu bia b
...
isuike bua kuenza bua kukuba biuma biebe bia mu nyuma?
20 Ikala mudiakaje bua kulekela tshintu tshionso tshidi mua kutekesha dinanga diebe dia Bukalenge bua Nzambi. Ikala mudisuike bua kuyisha ne tshisumi, ne kujimiji dinanga diebe dia mudimu wa diyisha nansha. Tungunuka ne kukeba malu malelela a mu Bible. Paudi wenza nunku, neudibutshile ‘biuma mu diulu mudi muivi kayi mua kusemena pabuipi anyi bishi kabiyi mua kudia. Bualu bua muaba udi biuma biebe ke wikala muoyo webe kabidi.’—Luka 12:33, 34.

Martha udi wamba ne: “Mudimu wanyi mupiamupia wakambuluisha dîku dianyi bua kuikala bimpe, kadi wakamfikisha kabidi ku dienza malu adi kaayi makane a mishindu yonso. Ngakatuadija kusekelela mafesto a mu bitendelelu, kubuela mu malu a tshididi ne mu bitendelelu. Mvua Ntemu wa Yehowa uvua mushiyangane ne tshisumbu munkatshi mua bidimu 40. Pavua bidimu bienda anu bipita, mvua ngela meji ne: Yehowa kavua kabidi mua kumfuila luse to. Mvua mumone ne: nansha meme muine mvua anu ndipisha. Nansha nanku, 
... 
 ukufuila luse? Konkonona malu abidi avua mukalenge Davidi muenze. Bua kumpala, wakamba ne: “Nentonde matomboka [mibi] anyi kudi Yehowa.” (Musambu 32:5) Uvuluke ne: Yehowa ukadi mumane kukubikila bua wewe kusemena kudiye mu disambila ne bua ‘kupunga nende dîyi.’ Itaba dibikila edi. Tonda mibi yebe kudi Yehowa, umuleje muudi udiumvua. Bu muvua Davidi mumanye bualu ebu, wakasambila ne dishindika dionso wamba ne: ‘Untokeshe ku bubi buanyi. Wewe Nzambi, kuena upetula mutshima wa majiya ne udi unying
...
i. Ku kakese ku kakese, meme kuibidilangana kabidi ne Yehowa. Bualu buvua bunkolele bikole bua meme kupingana nkulomba luse bua mibi yonso imvua muenze. Kadi ndekelu wa bionso, meme kusemena kudi Nzambi mu disambila ne kumulomba bua amfuile luse. Mbikole bua kuitaba ne: kuvua kupite bidimu 40 kumpala kua meme kupingana kudi Yehowa. Lelu ndi ne tshijadiki tshia ne: nansha panyima pa bidimu bia bungi, badi mua kupetesha kabidi muntu mushindu wa kuenzela Nzambi mudimu ne kuikala mu dinanga diende.”

... 
vuija bayidi bende. ...
bikuabu. Kadi kumpala kua Âkelao kutuadijaye kukokesha, uvua ne bua kuenza luendu lule kuya ku Lomo bua kupeta dianyisha dia kudi Kaisa Augusto.

1, 2. Mushindu udi Yehowa ututangila mmushilangane ne kamera ku tshinyi?
MU MATUNGA a bungi, batu bateke kamera bua kutangila badi bapita mu njila ne kukuata bimfuanyi bia njiwu idi yenzeka. Kamera koku kakuate bimfuanyi bia mashinyi avua makume muntu manyeme, bimfuanyi ebi bidi mua kuambuluisha bamfumu bua kumanya muendeshi wa mashinyi udi munyeme ne kumukuata. ... 
nga dia Philippines. Yeye ne mukajende bavua bampanda-njila ba pa tshibidilu eku ne dîku dinene dia kudisha. Dimue dituku, biakabatonda pavuabu bapete mukanda wa kudi mfumu wa tshipapu uvua ubipata mu madimi ende. Uvua ubipata bua tshinyi? Bavua babashiminyine ne: kabavua ne bululame to. Nansha muvua muanetu wa balume eu uditatshisha bua kupeta muaba mukuabu wa kusombaye ne dîku diende, wakamba ne: “Yehowa neambuluishe. Misangu yonso utu anu ukumbaja majinga etu nansha bualu kayi butufukile.” Di
...

20 Yehowa udi umona bionso biudi wenza ne ndekelu wa bionso neakufute. Paudi umanya ne: mêsu a Yehowa adi kuudi, kudimonyi bu ne: kudi kamera kadi kenda kakulondakaja to. Kadi, udimone pabuipi ne Nzambi udi ukutabalela ne udi uditatshisha bua bualu buebe.

Muakuidi wa malu a ngumu ne a ngumu, Patrick MUYAYA KATEMBWE wakalongolola muyuki wa ku tshiibi mu Disatu dia 6 ngondo muisambombo wa 2023. Mu malu avuabu bayukidilangana muvua bipeta bia malu avua menzeke mu tshimenga tshia Goma mu dia 30 ngondo muanda mukulu wa tshidimu tshia 2023.
Muakuidi wa mbulamatadi wakaleja mu mêyi a mbangilu a muyuki eu ne: kasumbu k
... 
bonso ba malu a bukubi ba mu tshimenga tshia Goma, kusangisha ne mulombodi wa tshiluilu ne mulombodi wende, mulombodi wa bampulushi, ANR ne DGM. Tshisumbu tshia bantu, tshisumbu tshia bantu ba miaba mishilashilangane, bimvundu bia bantu ne bantu ba miaba yonso.
Panyima pa diyukidilangana edi, bipeta biakafikisha ku dilumbuluisha mulombodi wa tshiluilu tshia balami ba ditunga ne mulombodi wa tshiluilu tshia basalayi ku kabadi ka basalayi ka mu Goma.

...
inga kakole ne tshiji tshikole bua lufu lua bena ditunga aba.

Muntu mukuabu uvua mu tshisumbu etshi uvua mutangidi wa malu a tshiluilu tshia ditunga dia République démocratique du Congo.

Udi musombe pa muaba webe wa tshibidilu ku mesa a kudîla, muindile difika dia muanetu Charles Russell. Diakamue, tshiibi tshia nzubu wa tshidîlu tshidi tshiunzuluka ne muanetu Russell ubuela. Russell udi upuwa katupa bu pa tshibidilu, ne udi wela bena mu dîku dia Betele muoyo ne musangelu wamba ne: “Muoyo wenu bonso.” Kadi, pamutu
...

Kadi, bulelela budi ne: katshia mu 1914, tshidiendelandela tshia mu diulu tshidi tshikale tshimfuanyi tshia tshitupa tshia bulongolodi bua Yehowa tshidi katshiyi tshimueneka tshidi tshienda tshiya kumpala ne lubilu lukole, anu mutuabimona tuetu babale bimpe mukanda eu. Tudi ne disanka dia kudisangisha nenu, nuenu “bena mudimu” netu. Manyayi ne: tudi banunange bikole buonso buenu. Tudi tusambila bua malu adi mu mukanda eu anuambuluishe bua kuanyisha bumpianyi buenu bua mu nyuma bikole kupita ne kumpala.—Mat. 24:45.

Bua tshinyi Jozefe uvua mudikungule muedi kumpala kua kuya kudi Palô?
Bilondeshele muyuki udi mu Genese, Palô wakatuma dîyi bua balue ne Jozefe muena Ebelu uvua mu buloko pa lukasa bua amujinguluile bilota biende. Tshikondo atshi Jozefe ukavua muenze ndambu wa bidimu mu buloko. Nansha muvua Palô mumubikidishe lukasa lukasa, Jozefe wakanji kudikungula muedi. (Genese 39:20-23; 41:1, 14) Difunda dia bualu ebu nansha mudibu bumueneka kabuyi ne mushinga wa bungi, didi dileja Jozefe uvua mumanye bimpe
... 
eji tshikuabu tshidi tshileja ne: bilele bia bena Ejipitu bivua bilomba bua muntu kudilongolola kumpala kua kuya kudi Palô anu mutuye wenza kumpala kua kubuela mu ntempelo. Pa nanku, Jozefe uvua ne bua kuikala mudikungule nsuki yonso ya ku mutu ne ya pambidi.—Biblical Archaeology Review.
Mukanda wa Bienzedi udi wamba ne: tatuende wa Timote uvua muena Greke. Bidiku biumvuija ne: uvua mufumine mu ditunga dia Grèce anyi?
Kabiena anu mua kuikala nanku to. Mu mikanda ivua mupostolo Paulo mufunde ku b
...
Isocrate ngamba-malu wa ku Athènes wakamba ne lutambishi luonso bua muvua bilele bia bena Greke bitangalake pa buloba bujima. Wakakula bua tshipeta tshia bualu ebu ne: “bakadi babikila bantu batuvua tuetu balongeshe ne: bena Greke pamutu pa kubikilabu bana ba mu Grèce nanku.” Nunku, tudi mua kuamba ne: tatuende wa Timote uvua kayi muena Yuda ne bantu bakuabu bavua Paulo ubikila ne: bena Greke bavua mua kuikala bena Greke bilondeshile bilele, kadi kabayi bana balela ba mu Grèce to.—Bienzedi 16:1.

Albrecht Dürer (/ˈdjʊərər/;German: [ˈalbʁɛçt ˈdyːʁɐ]; 21 ngondo 5 wa 1471 ,6 ngondo 4 wa 1528), imwe misangu mufunda mu tshingeleshi bu Durer, uvua mufundi wa malu a malu a pa buloba, mufundi wa mikanda ne mufundi wa ngenyi wa malu a mu tshikondo tshia Renaissance mu Allemagne. Bu muvua Dürer muledibue mu tshimenga tshia Nuremberg, wakamanyisha lumu luende ne bukole buende mu matunga a ku Mputu pavuaye ne bidimu bipite pa 20 bualu uvua mupatule bimfuanyi bia mushinga mukole mu mabaya. Uvua uyukila ne bafundi banene ba mu Italie ba tshikondo tshiende bu mudi: Raphael, Giovanni Bellini, Fra Luca Pacioli ne Leonardo da Vinci, ne kubangila mu 1512, Mukalenge Maximilian I uvua umuambuluisha.

Babadi ba tshikandakanda kampanda bakadiebeja ne: “Tshitendelelu tshidiku tshitusangisha mu buobumue anyi peshi tshidi tshitutapulula?” Bantu ba bungi bavua bandamune lukonko elu bavua bambe ne: tshitendelelu tshidi tshitutapulula.
KADI bitendelelu bidi bidisangisha pamue bidi biobi bimona malu mu mushindu mukuabu. Eboo Patel uvua mutuadije kusangisha pamue bansonga ba bitendelelu bishilangane udi wamba ne: “Kakuena tshitendelelu tshidi katshiyi tshilongesha difuilangana dia luse . . . , dilama 
... 
enzelawu penu.” (Matayi 7:12) Kadi ditabuja dilelela didi dimanyina anu mu dienzelangana malu mimpe anyi?
Mupostolo Paulo wakambila bantu bavua badiamba muvuabu benzela Nzambi mudimu mu matuku ende ne: “Badi ne tshisumi bua Nzambi, kadi ki mbilondeshile dimanya dijalame to.” Bua tshinyi uvua muambe nunku? Paulo udi wamba ne: ‘Bualu, kabavua bamanye buakane bua Nzambi, kadi bavua bakeba bua kujadika buabu bobu.’ (Lomo 10:2, 3) Bu muvuabu kabayi ne dimanya dijalame dia tshivua Nzambi musue bua ben
...
: ‘Nenkudimune muakulu wa bantu ba bende bua wikale muakulu wa ku mishiku milengejibue; bua bobu bamanye mua kubikila dîna dia Yehowa, bamukuatshile mudimu ne diapa dionso muinshi mua bujitu.’ Buobumue budi bufumina ku dimanya dia “muakulu mukezuke,” mbuena kuamba ne: mikenji ya Nzambi bua malu a ntendelelu.
Bantemu ba Yehowa badi bakubikila ne muoyo mujima bua kubuela mu Nzubu wabu wa Bukalenge udi pabuipi ne muaba uudi musombele bua umone ne ebe abidi ditalala ne buobumue bidi munkatshi muabu.

= À CONNAÎTRE PAR TOUS LES CONGOLAIS =
TRADUCTION : TSHILUBA
Dibwelakana dja Rwanda mu thinyongopelu cidi ditunga dianyi ne bana ba Congo bonsu bikadibwe tshidi tshilwila ku bipuka bia Congo biangata kudi bilwilu bia Mu Rwanda ne balunda babi ba M23. Bindi ngamba ebi kabiema kabidi bia vila to katshia bisumbu bia bena menji bituna kudi ONU, bisumbu bia dilondosholola bia bituka bia mayi manena, bisumbu bia bakuidi ba bantu bitaba bwase Rwanda udi u lwisha ditalala mu Congo.
Bwa kushidimwisha matunga abuloba bujima ne Kujikija mivilu ya Rwanda mu bidi bitangila malu aha, balombodi ba Congo badi balomba tshiakabidi kudi nfumu wa bidi bitangila ditalala buloba bujima bwa ne apesha patoka mifundu ya ntemu yivu mikatangila bwalu bwa nvita mu kongo kudi bantu bonsu ba mu tshisumbu tshienda bwane bobu ni yeya mwina ba manya mushindu kayi badi bwa kujikija nvita ku luseka lwa Congo wa kudi diba dipatukila bwane bantu binsu bitabuja ne tshina tshisumbu etshi tshidi tshiamba bulelela.
Ku benga kunemeka malomba etu aha, nku tumisha Rwanda bwane atunguluka dienza dia bibi, kuiba ni kushebeya mu Congo. Kubenga kunemeka malomba etu kudi kapidi ku sombesha ngelelu wa menji wa bena Congo mu bidi bitangila dia tshinua dia Rwanda ni ONU.
Kebwatshinyi tudi tulomba diumbuka dia Monusco mu Congo wa mungalata ne tu manyisha kudi yeya mwina ewu ni diumbuka dienda kadieba dileja ditapuluka pankatshi pa Congo ni ONU to.

to wakandamuna ne: “Nudi mua kuangata balami. Ndayi nulame ku lukita bu munudi bamone.”—Matayi 27:63-65.
Mu Dia lumingu mu dinda, Mariya wa ku Magadala, Mariya mamuende wa Yakobo ne bantu bakaji bakuabu bakalua ne bintu bia dipembu dimpe ku lukita bua kulongolola mubidi wa Yezu. Bakebejangana ne: “Nnganyi watubungulujila dibue didi ku mushiku wa lukita?” (Mâko 16:3) Kadi buloba buakakanka. Bualu bukuabu, muanjelu wa Nzambi uvua mumbushe dibue, balami bavua bumbuke, ne ku lukita kushalaku kutupu.

Lauieshiuti tipishkau-pishum kakushapatikau unakutauat ninitutshikan tshetshi neikaniti anu tshetshi shutshishimakaniti teuaut Ka-natuuht eiapit kie uinuau kenuenitakau miam mate : mashkua ushkanua tshetshi minupanitau natshi-nipiatau mashkua. Eukuan ne auen, matishu etakanit.
Eukuan ne anu uet apishissihit uet pikutat tshetshi apikunat tshitshikau-pishimua. Ekue tutak tshetshi tshishikanit kie tshetshi tipishkanit.
Tshakapesh tshitshishkutamakanu nanitamu tshe ui apatshiakianu uet apishissishet ma kat tshinanu.

République démocratique du Congo neenza mu dia 30 ngondo 5 too ne dia 2 ngondo 6 wa 2023, mu Pullman Hôtel wa Kinshasa, tshisangilu tshia baministere ba SADC badi balombola bua mushindu wa bantu ba balume ne ba bakaji, muinshi mua tshiena bualu tshia “Kukankamija dienza dia bintu bia mushinga wa bungi ku diambuluisha dia dienza malu a madimi. difila mushinga wa mabue ne dienza dia malongo a mushinga wa mu tshitupa, bua kupeta didiunda dia malu a mpetu didi dikongoloja bantu bonso ne didi dishala
... 
omic Empowerment (RMD-WEEP), programe wa bakaji, ditalala ne bukubi, tshipatshila tshia mu tshitupa tshia ditunga dia SADC ne tshipatshila tshia dienza malu bua kuluisha tshikisu tshia bantu balume ne bakaji mu bidimu bia 2018-2030, bumanyishi bua bantu bakaji mu malu a tshididi ne mu midimu ya kuangata mapangadika, ne dienda kumpala dia dipetangana dia bantu balume ne bakaji mu biro bia sekretere wa SADC”, ke muvua sekretere munene wa ditunga dia Congo muambe.

...
gana bua diambuluishangana dia Afrike wa ku Sud (SADC). Mudimu wende ngua kutungunuja dikola dia malu a mpetu ne a nkaya ne dia malu a mpetu a kashidi ne a buakane ku diambuluisha dia ndongamu idi yenza mudimu bimpe ne idi yambuluisha, ku dikolesha dia diumvuangana ne ditungunuja dia mbulamatadi muimpe ne ditalala ne bukubi bua kashidi, bua tshitupa etshi tshikudimuke tshintu tshidi ne bukole ne tshia kutembangana mu malanda a bantu ba pa buloba bujima ne mu malu a mpetu.

TSHIBUMBA TSHIA NSENTEDI Ngondo 2 2015 | Muudi mua kunanga mudimu webe
Bantu ba bungi mbanange kuenza mudimu udi ubasankisha bikole. Ntshinyi tshidi tshibambuluisha bua kuikala ne mmuenenu muimpe bua mudimu mukole?
Biena-bualu bia pa tshizubu
Bamue bantu badi bela meji ne: mudimu mukole ki mmubakumbanyine. Kadi bantu ba bungi lelu mbanange kuenza mudimu mukole. Ntshinyi tshidi tshibambuluishe bua kunanga mudimu wabu?
A CONVERSATION WITH A NEIGHBOR
Nansha mudibu bafunde Bible kukadi bidimu bia bungi, udi ne mushinga lelu. Mmunyi mudi mêyi a mu Bible mua kukuambuluisha mu nsombelu webe mujima?
THE BIBLE CHANGES LIVES
Ernest Loedi wakapeta mandamuna a imue nkonko ya mushinga mukole. Mandamuna mimpe a mu Bible akamupesha ditekemena dilelela bua matuku atshilualua.

Ela meji bua ditalala ne bukubi bikala mbulamatadi wa buloba bujima mua kutuadila bantu. Bua tshinyi tudi mua kuitabuja mulayi wa Nzambi bua mbulamatadi wa mushindu eu? Nnganyi wikala mukokeshi muimpe wa mbulamatadi eu?

Muanda wa Ecole primaire, secondaire et technique, Tony MWABA KAZADI ne Muanda wa Communication et Médias, Muanda-kamba wa mbulamatadi, Patrick MUYAYA KATEMBWE, bakenza mu diamatuku 4 ngondo wa tshitema 2023, tshisangilu tshia kumanyisha malu a tulasa tua 2023-2024 mu République démocratique du Congo.
Mu mêyi ende a ntuadijilu, Tony Mwaba wakajadika ne: dilonga dia mu kalasa mu tshidimu tshia 2023-2024 nedikale ne mushinga mu ditunga dijima nansha mu provense yonso ya 60.
“Ndi musue kujadika ne:
... 
provense yonso ya 60. Bobu ke badi balue kutuadija mudimu eu mu Kinshasa, mu provense kudi ba-gouverneur, ba-ministre ba provense anyi balombodi ba provense“, ke mudi ministre wa EPST muambe.
Tony Mwaba wakaleja kabidi ne: mu bimenga bia bungi bu mudi Goma ne Tshikapa, dilua dia kalasa kadiena dienza bualu nansha bumue.
“Kudi miaba bu mudi Goma, bana kabena mua kupingana mu tulasa to, bualu mbulamatadi mmuambe ne: mu tshimenga kamuena bantu. Mu Tshikapa, mvula wa bungi mmuloke mu dinda dia lelu,
...
u tulasa bua buôwa bua ne: basalayi ba tshiluilu tshia ditunga, ministre wa EPST udi wamba mudiye mulombe balombodi ba mu provense bua kulongolola mushindu mukuabu wa bana aba kulonga.
Bua bidi bitangila mushindu wa kuenza bua tshidimu tshia 2023-2024 tshikale tshimpe, Tony Mwaba udi wamba ne: mudimu wende udi wenda ulongolola mushindu wa kuangata balongeshi ku mpungilu. Uvua utamba kuimanyina pa mushindu wa kukolesha ne kulama dilongesha dia tshianana mu ditunga dia RDC.
Shekinah gloire kabongo

BIDIMU bia bungi kumpala, muakunyanyi wa bakaji Araceli wakafika munda ne kutandaye wamba ne: “Kungakuishi kabidi to. Tshiena musue kumvua bualu nansha bumue bua mu tshitendelelu tshienu to. Bidi binsamisha mutu. Ndi mukukine!” Mêyi ende aa akansama ku muoyo bikole. Ndi mpindieu ne bidimu 91, ne ntshidi anu ngavuluka bimpe. Kadi, anu bu mudi Muambi 7:8 wamba, ‘nshikidilu wa muanda udi upita tshibangidilu tshiawu bulengele.’—Felisa.
Felisa: Ndi mukolele mu dîku dia bapele mu ditunga dia Espagne. 
... 
 misangu yonso musue kusankisha Nzambi. Pashishe ngakalonga bulelela pa bidi bitangila Yehowa ne ngakatuadija kumunanga bikole. Mvua musue kuambila muntu yonso bualu buende. Mu 1973, ngakatambula. Dîba dionso dimvua mpeta mushindu, mvua ngambila bena mu dîku dietu bulelela bua mu Bible. Kadi bena mu dîku dietu, nangananga muakunyanyi Araceli uvua usumisha wamba ne: mvua muitabuje malu a dishima.
Araceli: Bu muvuabu bangenzela malu mu mushindu mubi mu kuvan, ngakafikila ntendelelu wetu munda ne t
...
avua basue to. Kadi pashishe, bakitaba pabu bulelela. Ebu buvua bualu butambe buimpe buvua bumfikile mu nsombelu wanyi. Pashishe tuvua tupitshisha dîba pamue tuyukila malu a Yehowa, Nzambi wetu wa dinanga, ne a mu Dîyi diende! Tuvua tuenza nanku bualu tuetu bonso tuvua tutendelela Yehowa. *
^ tshik. 29 Araceli udi ne bidimu 87, Felisa udi ne bidimu 91 ne Ramoni udi ne bidimu 83. Buonso buabu batshidi benzela Yehowa mudimu ne lulamatu. Lauri wakafua mu 1990, ne uvua pende ne lulamatu kudi Yehowa.

MMUNYI mudibu bakudimune Musambu wa 83:18 mu Bible webe? Mu Mukanda wa Nzambi mbakudimune mvese eu ne: ‘Bua bamanye biabu ne: wewe nkayebe, ngudi muidike dîna dia Yehowa, udi Mutambe Bunene wa pa mutu pa buloba bujima.’ Ke mudibu bamukudimune kabidi mu imue Bible. Kadi mu Bible ya bungi mbumushe Yehowa, bapingaje “Maweja,” “Mukalenge” anyi “Mfumu.” Ntshinyi tshidi ne bua kuikala mu mvese eu? Dîna dia tshianana anyi dîna dia Yehowa?
Dîna dia Nzambi mu maleta a tshiena-Ebelu
Mvese eu udi wakula bu
... 
ungi ba kudibu batu bela meji ne: ki mbimpe kutela dîna dia Nzambi to. Tshidibi, tshilele etshi ntshishindamene pa ngumvuilu mubi wa mukenji wa mu Bible udi wamba ne: ‘Kutedi dîna dia Yehowa, Nzambi webe tshitelatela, bua Yehowa kêna ubingisha muntu udi utela dîna diende tshitelatela.’—Ekesode 20:7.
Mukenji eu udi ukandika ditela dibi dia dîna dia Nzambi. Kadi udiku ukandika ditela dîna dia Nzambi ne kanemu konso anyi? Tòo. Bafundi ba Bible wa mu tshiena-Ebelu (“Dipungila Dikulukulu”) bavua bant
...
i bamanye dîna dia Yehowa ki mbamanye ngikadilu yende milenga eyi nansha.
Bidi bimueneka patoke ne: dîna dia Nzambi didi ne bua kuikala mu Bible. Kumanya diumvuija dia dîna edi ne kuditela patudi tumutendelela nekutuambuluishe bikole bua kushemeja malanda ne Tatu wetu wa mu diulu Yehowa.*
* Bua kumanya malu a bungi adi atangila Dîna dia Nzambi, diumvuija diadi, ne bua tshinyi mbimpe kuditela patudi tumutendelela, bala kakanda ka Le nom divin qui demeure à jamais, kapatula kudi Bantemu ba Yehowa.

Dibala dia bibejibeji bia Tshibumba tshia Nsentedi bishale ebi divua dikusankishe anyi? Nanku, anji tangila ni udi mua kuandamuna nkonko idi ilonda eyi:
Mbubi kayi buvua Yezu muakuile pakafilaye mubelu udi mu Matayi 18:15-17?
Uvua wakula bua bilumbu bidi benabi mua kujikija nkayabu. Kadi bubi ebu budi ne bua kuikala bubi bunene budibu mua kuipatshila muntu mu tshisumbu bobu kabayi bajikije tshilumbu atshi. Tshilejilu, budi mua kuikala kushiminyina muntu bualu anyi kuibila.—w16.05, dib. 7.
Ntshin
... 
undi udi tshimfuanyi tshia Yezu Kristo udi utua bantu bapanduka tshimanyinu.—w16.06, dib. 31-32.
Bible mmupanduke ku ntatu ya mushindu kayi?
Mmupanduke ku 1) dibola dia bintu bivuabu benze nabi mudimu bua kumufunda bu mudi: papirise ne biseba bia nyama; 2) buluishi bua bena tshididi ne bamfumu ba bitendelelu bavua badienzeje bua kumujimija; ne 3) dijinga divua nadi bamue bantu dia kushintulula mukenji udimu.—wp16.4, dib. 4-7.
Ngamue malu kayi adi muena Kristo mua kuenza bua kupepeja nsombelu wen
...
bintu kampanda bia kale badi batela nzubu wa Davidi, ne Yezu pende wakakula bua bualu buende. Malu adibu baleje bua muaba au adi apetangana ne malu adi mamanyike bimpe.—wp16.5, dib. 13.
Mmunyi mudi dimanya, dijingulula dia malu ne meji bishilangane?
Muntu udi ne dimanya udi ne malu anyi bijadiki bidiye mulame. Muntu udi ne dijingulula dia malu udi ukeba mudi bualu kampanda bupetangana ne bukuabu. Kadi muntu udi ne meji udi wenza mudimu bimpe ne dimanya ne dijingulula dia malu.—w16.10-F, dib. 18.

Table des matières
Tudi bamanye Timote mu shap. 16 wa Bienzedi. Malanda a mupostolo ne « muan’andi wa bushua mu ditabusha » akadi malelela. Kutangila apa udi umufundila mu ngikadilu wa bupostolo, bua kulesha bukokeshi buakadiye umupesha bua kukumbasha malu onso akadiye ne bua kumuambila mu mukanda eu. Nsongalume eu muyidi, wakapeta mudimu mukole : kuambila muntu yonso mushindu kayi udiye ne bua kuenza mu nzubu wa Nzambi (shap. 3. 15). Mudimu wakamupebua wakadi ne ndekelu (kipatshila) dinanga.
Mu
... 
mpe, budi mu bubandidi bua banjelo, dina diende didi diambibua pa buloba, kunyima kuambudibua kuandi mu diulu mu butumbi, bionso ebi bidi bitupa binene bidi kabiyi mua kutapuluka ne bualu busokoka ebu bunene bupesha ekelesia. Yeye eu udi ne bushitu ku mpala kua Mukelenge bua « kushindamisha » ne kulama Bulelela buonso (mv. 15 ndekelu).
Bualu busokoka bua malu a Nzambi buakapetudibua kudi bantu ba bungi ! Bakuabu bakumusha malu akadi abatatshisha. Bakuabo biabu, bakasakidila bilele bia patupu any
...
 (mv. 18) ; bibutshilu bimpe, bishimikidi bimpe bua tshikondo tshilualua (mv. 19). Eyo, tumanye mua kutapulula ne kuangata « tshidi menemene muoyo ».
Nyema…, londa…, luangana nvita… kuata…, tuakupeta meyi aa mu dibala dietu (mv. 11, 12). Mv. wa 20 udi ujikula diakula dia bukokeshi bunene dia pa buadi : « wewe Timote ulama tshiakakupebua » (tangila kabidi mv. 14 ne 2 Tim. 1. 14). Edi ke disengelela dia ndekelu, ditudi tubikila nsonga yonso udi ubala, ateke dina diandi pa muaba wa dina dia Timote.

- Kinshasa: Ngondu inayi kunyima kua dibanjija bukalenga bua Ilunga Ilukamba , bena bukalenga ebu bonsu mbaya ku zongo mu polovense wa kongo central bua kuya kunana lungenyi ne kushemesha bobumua bua bukalenga ne kushikuluja dimania diabu .
- Kinshasa:mfumu wa ditunga felix antoine Tshisekedi uvua muvuija ne muyuki ewu udi bua kukeba bukola bua bukalenga ne dienza tshintu tshimua .
- Bunia:Mu Ituri, bantu bikala ne bia lufu ku bianza badibu bamba ne ba mai mai bavua babunda mu dinda dia lelu localite isatu ya mu territoire wa Mambasa.
- Goma:Mu territoire wa Masisi, bena tshimuangi batua ku binunu 6 ne badi bapingana ku mabu bonsu nsombelu wabu kena muimpa to .
- Kalemie:Kunyima kua diba mafutu a balongeshi mu dia matuku 24 ngondu ewu kudi bantu bikala ne bia lufu ku bianza badi kabayi bamanyika to , bukalenga bua province wa Tanganyika budi bunyingalala bua bualu ebu .
- Mbuji Mayi: Mu province wa Sankuru, PEV mubueja lelu wa ditanu tshisalu tshipia tshipia tshidi tshiluisha masama a munda .

‘Ubambile bua benze malu mimpe, bua bakuate bikole ku muoyo wa bushuwa.’—1 TIMOTE 6:18, 19.
MISAMBU: 125, 40
1, 2. a) Ntshinyi tshiudi muindile ne muoyo kuulu kuulu mu Mparadizu? (Tangila tshimfuanyi.) b) Ntshinyi tshiatupetesha disanka dia bungi mu bulongolodi bupiabupia?
TUDI bushuwa bindile ne muoyo kuulu kuulu bua kupeta “muoyo wa tshiendelele.” Mupostolo Paulo wakabikila muoyo eu ne: “muoyo wa bushuwa.” (Bala 1 Timote 6:12, 19.) Bua bantu ba bungi, bualu ebu budi buleja ne: nebasombe kashid
... 
ua kuleja ku mpindieu ne: tudi ne lutulu?
9 Mu bulongolodi bupiabupia, nebikengele bua tuetu kuikala ne lutulu bimue bikondo. Tshilejilu, tudi mua kumvua ne: bamue bantu badi basanka bua mudi balela ne balunda babu babishibue ku lufu. Kadi, bidi mua kutulomba bua kuindila dibishibua dia banangibue betu. Biobi mua kuenzeka nunku, netusankaku nabu ne kushala ne lutulu anyi? (Lomo 12:15) Tuetu balonge ku mpindieu mua kuindila ne lutulu bua Yehowa kukumbajaye milayi yende, nebituambuluishe bua kusha
...
e kupita ne mutudi tuela meji. Tulejayi mutudi ne dijinga dikole dia kusomba mu Mparadizu pa kudilongolola ku mpindieu bua “muoyo wa bushuwa.” Tuikalayi ne ngikadilu idi Yehowa utulongesha bua kuikala nayi ne tuyishayi lumu luimpe ne tshisumi tshionso. Tutekayi ntendelelu wa Yehowa pa muaba wa kumpala mu nsombelu wetu bua tuikale ne disanka. Tudi bashindike ne: mu bulongolodi bupiabupia Yehowa neakumbaje malu onso adiye mulaye. Nunku, tuenzayi malu bienze anu bu tukadi mu bulongolodi bupiabupia!

Tempelo ya mu kimonwa kya Ezekyele ilombola’mba bantu ba Yehova badi bakwipāna na mutyima tō. Le muntu ne muntu ukokeja kwela bitapwa bya mitendelo namani?—Bah 13:15, 16.
Muswelo muyampe bidi wa kwela bitapwa i kwingila bu pania mukwashi. Mwaka wa mingilo wa 2018 udi na myeji mivule idi na mayenga a ma Dya Mposo nansha ma Dya Yenga atano. Uno i mukenga muyampe ku boba basapulanga’nka Dya Mposo ne Dya Yenga mwanda wa kwingila kobengila bininge ku kaji. Kadi basapudi bakokeja kutonga kwingila bupania mukwashi bwa mansá 30 nansha 50 mu Kweji 3 ne Kweji 4, nansha mu kweji obapempulwa na mutadi wa kipindi.
Ino shi ngikadilo yotudi’mo keitulengejapo twingile bu pania mukwashi? Tukokeja kulonga bukomo bwa kulumbulula musapwilo wetu, padi na kusapula’ko bininge. Nansha twikale mu ngikadilo’ka, tulomba’mba buswe botusenswe Yehova bwitutonone tumupe biyampe byotudi nabyo mu mwaka wa mingilo wa 2018!—Hos 14:2.

Le i myeji’ka nansha kweji’ka okokeja kwingila bu pania mukwashi mu mwaka wa mingilo wa 2018?

Tuetu bonso tudi tuela meji bua matuku atshilualua. Tudi tudiebeja muikala nsombelu wetu ne wa bantu batudi banange mu matuku atshilualua. Tudi mua kudiela nkonko eyi: ‘Bana banyi nebikale ne muoyo mu buloba buimpe anyi? Nebabutule buloba ebu dimue dituku anyi? Kudiku tshindi mua kushintula mpindieu bua kulengeja nsombelu wanyi wa matuku atshilualua anyi?’ Nkonko ya mushindu eyi idi ileja tshitudi basue kuikala, bualu tudi basue kuikala ne nsombelu muimpe ne mu bukubi. Wewe mumanye bimpe malu at
... 
mbi wakamanyisha ne: muntu mulume mukuabu diende Kolesha uvua ne bua kulombola basalayi bua kukuata tshisamba kampanda. Kolesha eu uvua kabidi ne bua kupikula bena Yuda bavua mu bupika ne kubambuluisha bua bobu kuibakulula ntempelo wabu wa tshijila. Nzambi uvua kabidi mumanyishe ne: Kolesha uvua ne bua kumisha mâyi a musulu ne kupeta biibi bia tshimenga bikangula bua bobu kumona mua kutshibutula bipepele. (Yeshaya 44:27–45:2) Malu a bungi a mu mulayi wa Nzambi eu avuaku makumbane ne bujalame buo
...
ngidijila bua kuenza nebuenjibue, nengenze malu anakusua kuenza.’ (Yeshaya 46:10) Wewe ne bena mu dîku diebe nudi mua kupeta masanka a bungi mu matuku atshilualua. Ebeja Bantemu ba Yehowa bua bakuambile tshidi Bible wamba bua malu atshilualua. Bantemu ba Yehowa ki mbena mbuku anyi kabena badiamba mudibu bayukila ne nyuma kampanda, peshi ne bukole kansanga bua pa buabu bua kumanyisha malu atshilualua. Mbalongi ba Bible badi mua kukuleja malu mimpe adi Nzambi mulaye bua kuenzela bantu kumpala eku.

TUDI mu tshidimu tshia 1923. Mu nzubu munene wa manaya wa mu São Paulo muvua muule tente ne bantu. Fuanyikijabi umvua dîyi dishindame dia muanetu George Young. Bavua bakudimuna muyuki wende wonso mu Tshimputulukeshi. Bantu bonso 585 bavua bamuteleja ne ntema yonso. Mêyi a mvese ya mu Tshimputulukeshi avua apatuka mu lumuenu lua televizion. Ku ndekelu, bakabanyina bantu broshire wa Miliyo ya bantu badi ne muoyo lelu kabakufua to. Broshire eu uvua kabidi mu Anglais, mu tshiena Allemagne ne tshiena
... 
buela mu bimue bisangilu mu tshisumbu kampanda mu New York pavua eku benda balongolola mazuwa abu. Pakapinganabu mu tshimenga tshia Rio de Janeiro, bakamanyisha bantu bakuabu ditekemena dia mu Bible divuabu balonge. Panyima pa matuku, mu ngondo 3 mu 1923, George Young, uvua pèlerin (lelu mutangidi muena ngendu) wakafika mu Rio de Janeiro, muakapetaye bantu bavua banange bulelela. Ukavua mulongolole bua ikale ne ndambu wa mikanda ivuabu bakudimune mu Tshimputulukeshi. Muanetu Young wakaya diakamu
...
Brésil ne ba bungi ba kudibu bavua mu Rio de Janeiro.
Mpindieu, bidimu 90 pashishe, kabiena ne mushinga bua kudiebeja ne: “Ntshinyi tshienzekela bena mu Brésil ne bena mu Amerike wa ku Sud bonso?” nansha. Bantemu ba Yehowa bapite pa 760000 badi bayisha lumu luimpe mu Brésil. Badi bayisha mukenji wa Bukalenge mpindieu mu Amerike wa ku Sud mu Tshimputulukeshi, mu tshiena Espagne ne mu miakulu mikuabu ya bungi. Mu 1915, Sarah uvua muambilamu pakambaye ne: ‘Kudi mudimu wa dinowa wa bungi wa kuenza.’

Mmunyi mund

kaji munangibue wa Elekana. Uvua musue kuikala ne bana, kadi kavua mua kulela to. Pende mukenende Penina uvua mulele bana ba bungi. (Bala 1 Samuele 1:4-7.) Bua kunyanga malu bikole, Penina uvua umuseka “ku tshidimu ku tshidimu” bua bualu ebu. Bivua bisama Hana ku muoyo bikole. Wakenza tshinyi bua kupeta busambi? Wakasambila Yehowa. Bubi mbufumine penyi?
Mu kuamba kuimpe, bantu batu basue kuikala bena ditalala, bamba anu bulelela ne bena malu malenga. Kadi, bua tshinyi tudi tumona misangu ya bungi tshikisu, malu mabi ne dienzelangana bibi? Ngumu idi yenza bûowa mmivulangane bikole. Kudiku muntu kampanda udi ufikisha bantu ku dienza malu mabi anyi?
Nzambi uvuaku mufuke bantu ne dijinga dia kuenza malu mabi anyi? Tòo, Yehowa Nzambi uvua mufuke bantu mu tshimfuayi tshiende, bikale ne dijinga dia kuidikija dinanga diende. (Genese 1:27; Yobo 34:10) Kadi, bua kutua bantu mushinga menemene, Nzambi wakabapesha kabidi tshipedi tshia kudisunguila malu. Pavua baledi betu ba kumpala benze bubi ku bukole, bavua babenge kulonda tshilejilu tshia Nzambi, kuluabu bantu bapange bupuangane. Tudi bapetele dijinga dia kuenza bubi kudibu.
Netuikale anu ne bubi kashidi ne tshiendelele anyi?
Nzambi mmusue bua tuetu kukandamena dijinga ditudi nadi dia kuenza malu mabi. (Nsumuinu 27:11) Ke bualu kayi udi utulongesha mushindu wa kuepuka kuenza malu mabi ne utuleja mushindu wa kupeta disanka dia bushuwa. Kadi mpindieu katuena anu mua kuidikija dinanga dia Nzambi bimpe menemene to.
Nansha mudi bubi buvule lelu, Nzambi mmubulekele bua tshitupa tshîpi tshianana bua bonso bamone bipeta bibi bia bubi. (2 Petelo 3:7-9) Kadi, mu katupa kîpi emu, buloba nebuwule tente ne bantu badi batumikila Nzambi ne disanka.

MULELA MU 1974
DITUNGA DIABU: RÉPUBLIQUE DÉMOCRATIQUE D’ALLEMAGNE
TSHIVUAYE: KAVUA WITABA DIKALAKU DIA NZAMBI
TSHIVUAYE KALE
Mbandelele mu musoko kampanda wa mu Saxony, mu ditunga divuabu babikila kale ne: République Démocratique d’Allemagne (RDA). Nsombelu wa kumbelu uvua muimpe wa disanka, ne baledi banyi bavua bandongeshe bikadilu bimpe. RDA uvua ditunga dia bakoministe, ke bualu kayi bua bantu ba bungi mu Saxony, malu a Nzambi kaavua ne mushinga to. Buanyi meme, Nzambi kavuaku to. Kuvua malo
... 
udiela bua muoyo ne matuku atshilualua, bala Bible bimpe.”
Mvua ne dielakana eku ne dijinga dia kumanya, kadi dijinga dia kumanya divua dikole. Mandy wakangambila bua kubala Danyele nshapita 2, ne malu amvua mubalamu akankemesha bikole. Mêyi a buprofete aa adi akula bua dilondangana dia makokeshi a bukole a pa buloba anyi mbulamatadi ivua ne bua kuikala ne bukole bua bungi matuku etu aa. Mandy wakandeja mêyi makuabu a buprofete a mu Bible adi atangila matuku etu atshilualua. Ndekelu wa bionso mv
...
 dietu bualu tudi tudienzeja bikole bua kulonda mibelu idi Bible upesha bena dibaka. Tshilejilu, kulonda mibelu idimu ya kushala mulamate muena dibaka kudi kutungunuka ne kukolesha dibaka dietu.—Ebelu 13:4.
Tshiena kabidi ngumvua buôwa ne ndubakana bua matuku atshilualua. Ndi ndiumvua muikale mu dîku dia bena kuitabuja nanyi dia pa buloba bujima didi mu ditalala dilelela ne mu buobumue. Mu dîku edi tudi tumonangana bikale diatshimue. Ebu mbualu bumvua musue ne njinga kukumbaja mu nsombelu wanyi.

Muleji mpala wa ditunga dia Grande Bretagne mu ditunga dia RDC, Madame Alyson King O.B.E wakenze muyuki munene mudia matuku dikimi ni umue ngondo wa 7 wa 2023 ni ministre munene wa malu a diumvuangana ne a bikandakanda ki yeye mukalengne Patrick Muyaya mu biro biende bia mudimu.
Mu malu avuabu bakonkonone muvua lutatu ne mpunga ya malanda idi pankatshi pa ditunga dia Congo ne Grande-Bretagne.
“Masungula afila mpunga wa kuakaja lumu luimpe lua ditunga dia Congo ku babende. Ke bualu kayi tuvua ne 
... 
eka ku est kua ditunga dia Congo.
“Tudi basue ditalala ne bukubi mu ditunga dia Congo. Ke bualu kayi tuvua tuvua bayukila bikole bua bualu ebu ne tuvua balonge ne: kudi anu mushindu wa bena Afrike kujikija ntatu ya bena Afrike. Tudi tuenza muetu muonso bua kuambuluisha bua kupeta malu adi ashala kashidi bilondeshile malu adibu bafunde mu Luanda ne mu Nairobi“.
Nushala kumanya ne Alyson King wakadisangisha mu dia matuku 07 ngondo wa 7 eu ne Mulombodi wa Komision wa masungula mu ditunga (CENI), De
...
eta bimpe ne mulombodi wa CENI uvua mumanyishe mushindu wa kulongolola malu bua disungula dia mu dia mumatu makumi abidi ngondo wa dikumi ni ibidi wa 2023.
Wakajadika ne: ditunga diende didi dienza mudimu bua kupingaja ditalala mu tshitupa tshia ku est kua ditunga dia République démocratique du Congo, tshivua bena tshinyangu ba M23 banyenge kudi ditunga dia Rwanda. Mu bukokeshi buende, neenze muende muonso bua malanda a ditunga diende edi ne ditunga dia Congo ikale mimpe.

Mukelenge Yesu: Bumuntu buandi
1.1 Kilisto udi nganyi?
Kilisto udi nganyi? Bulelela elu ndukonko lunene luimpe (Mt. 16. 15) - lua mushinga lunudi ne bualu bua kuandamuna. Lumu luimpe luakafundabo Kudi Yone, luakafundibua "bua nuenu nuitabuje ne Kilisto udi Muana wa Nambi, ne bua nuenu nuikale ne muoyo panuitabuja" (Yone 20. 31). Wakalua muntu (diunvuija dia bualu ebu mu lukonko ludi lulonda) wakikala pa buloba bidimu bipite pa makumi asatu. wakajadikibua muakane kumpala kua tshilumbuluidi tshia 
... 
isto" katuena ne bua kumuakidila nansha (2 Yn. 9-11).
1.12 Kilisto wakalua muntu diba kayi?
Udi muledibue mu Betelehema, kukadi bidimu bipite pa 2000 (tangila Mika 5. 1 ne Lk 2. 4-7). Ke diba didi ubikila ne "dikumbana dia bikondo" (Galat. 4. 4). Muntu wakatetshibua mu mishindu ya bungi ne wakakuluka, kupambuka bikole. Ke tshikondo tshiakasungula Nzambi bua kutuma Muana wende ne bua kuakula munda muende (Ebel. 1. 1, 2).
1.13 Pakaluaye muntu, Kilisto wakalekela kuikala Nzambi anyi?
Nansha kakese.
...
isanka". Kundekelu, mu Bienzedi bia bapostolo 1. 14, Malia kena ne muaba wa pabuawu, udi mubadibue bu mukashi munkatshi mua bakuabu bakadi bananukila mu ditendelela ne bayidi ba Mukalenge. Kena ne mulongo wa pabuawu nansha. Mu tshikoso: Malia udi ne muaba wa pabuau - kadi wakadi muaba wa diakalengele, kaûyi wa bukokeshi nansha anyi wa bunfumu. Kuelela Malia masambila, kudi anu dikukuila dia mpingu (lupingu ntshintu anyi mmuntu udi wangata muaba wa Nzambi). Dikukuila didi dikumbanyina anu Nzambi.

Lebeka mmukaji uvua munange Yehowa. Bayende diende uvua Izaka. Yeye pende uvua munange Yehowa. Kadi Lebeka bakapetangana ne Izaka mushindu kayi? Mmushindu kayi wakalejaye ne: uvua ujinga bua kusankisha Yehowa? Tuanji tumonabi malu makuabu adi amutangila.
Abalahama ne Sala ke bavua baledi ba Izaka. Bavua basombele mu ditunga dia Kanâna muvua benamu kabayi batendelela Yehowa. Kadi Abalahama uvua musue bua muanende Izaka kuselaye anu mukaji uvua utendelela Yehowa. Ke yeye kutuma mupika wende kampan
... 
yi, yeye mumpeshe meme ne tumelu tuanyi etu mâyi, nemmanye ne: au ke mukaji uudi wewe musungule.’
Pashishe nsongakaji au, Lebeka, kufikaye ku tshina tshia mâyi aku. Bible udi wamba ne: Lebeka uvua ne mubidi muimpe be! Ke Eliezê kumulombaye mâyi a kunua, mpindieu Lebeka kumuambila ne: ‘Mbimpe. Ndi nkupesha wewe mâyi, ntuadila ne tumelu tuebe kabidi.’ Anji elabi meji! Patu tumelu ne nyota tutu tupuita mâyi bungi tshianana! Ke bualu kayi Lebeka uvua ne bua kubanda kupueka ku tshina tshia mâyi aku n
...
 bimpe ne: Yehowa ke uvua mutume Eliezê kuabu aku. Nunku pakamuebejabu kudi ba mu dîku diabu ne: udi musue kuya ku Kanâna bua kuselangana ne Izaka anyi? Lebeka wakandamuna ne: ‘Eyowa, ndi musue kuya.’ Anu pinapu, kujukabu ne Eliezê kuyabu. Pakafikabu mu Kanâna, bakaselangana ne Izaka.
Bu muvua Lebeka muenze bualu buvua Yehowa musue bua enze, Yehowa wakamubenesha. Pakapita bidimu bia bungi, Yezu wakaledibua mu bankana ba Lebeka! Nanku wewe mufuane Lebeka musankishe Yehowa, yeye neakubeneshe pebe.

Bualu bua dikema buakenzeka mu ditunga dia Congo waba kambua. Pakumuna makompanyi muanda mutekete mapete Bipungidi bia mushinga mukolo mu dienza Dia mudimi ni mudifila bintu popamue ni kompanyi wa Tenke Fungurume Mining (TFM) bionso ebi bivua bitua ku mushinga wa dolare miliyo 100.
Tshibilu etshi tshiakenzeka mu tshitupa tshia Fungurume, Kumpala kua Miguel Kashal Katemb, Mulombodi munene wa tshibambalu tshidi tshilombola midimu ya diambuluishangana mu tshibambalu tshia malu a mbulamatadi.
Ma kompanyi avua mapete Bipungidi ebi bumudi :
1.INVEST CONGO MINING SARL,
2.MUNDO CONSTRUCTION SARL,
3. ALMER ENGINEERING SARL ;
4. VICTOR MINING SERVICES SARL ;
5.KM-OIL,
6.PANACO SARL,
7.GROUPE KONGO OIL
Bualu bua dikema ebu budi bumvuangana ne tshipatshila tshia Mfumu Félix-Antoine Tshisekedi tshia kutungunuja dikumbana dia malu a mpetu mu ditunga dia Congo wa mungalata.
Muludiki munene wa AARSP wakaleja mushinga wa bualu ebu, mu mushindu Udi mu
Midimu eyi uvua ne mushinga wa bungi kudi ditunga dia bakambua.
Gloire Kabongo

Les titres:
- Kinshasa: Dikokangana didi dimueneka pankatshi pa bantu badi basombela mu kavuabu babikila kale camp Bumba mu commune wa Lemba munu mu tshimenga tshia Kinshasa.
- Kindu: Ku Maniema, makelela mushala ku kalima pa km 101 ku mutu kua tshimenga tshia kindu , muana wa bidim 16 uvua mushipa ku tshigoma kudi mpulushi .
- Kananga: Ku Kasaï-Central, commissaire mulombodi wa ba mpulushi mu polovense udi duimuija ba OPJ badi badifila mu diyobesha bantu badibu bakuata bua kubafutshisha bibawu .
- Beni: Ku Nord Kivu , tone ya cacao 1.500 ne ya Quinquina mikuata nkuenza matuku mu depot wa Direction Générale des Douanes et Assises (DGDA) Beni .
- Kinshasa: Nzubu wa dilamba dia manga udibu babikila ne Pharmakina mukumbaja lelu bidimu 60 . ditanda edi ditu ku Bukavu mu polovense wa sud kivu ditu dienza buanga bua quinine butu buluisha disama dia malaria .
- Lubumbashi: Bakaji bavula ba ku Haut katanga bimana kulu bua kuvuija menji abu pa tshilumbu tshia diteka balombodi bapia bapia ba kumpanyi ya mbula matadi..

MABEJI A TSHISANGILU TSHIA NSOMBELU NE MUDIMU WETU WA BUENA KRISTO Ngondo wa 8 2017
BIUMA BIA MU DÎYI DIA NZAMBI
Yehowa wakafuta bena Babilona panyima pa ditshintshimika diabu dia Tulo mu bidimu 13. Mmunyi mudiye uleja dianyisha bua mudimu utudi tumuenzela ne lulamatu ne bua malu atudi tudipangisha?
TUIKALAYI NE NSOMBELU WA BUENA KRISTO
Bua tshinyi budipuekeshi budi ne mushinga? Tudi tubuleja bishi? Mudi mudi disambila ne tshilejilu tshia Yezu bituambuluisha bua kuditatshisha bua kuikala ne budi
... 
A MU DÎYI DIA NZAMBI
Bansentedi bavua ne mudimu wa kudimuija bantu bavua mu tshimenga bua njiwu ivua yenda ilua. Pavua Yehowa muteke Yehezekele nsentedi wa mu tshimfuanyi bua Isalele, uvua usua kuleja tshinyi?
TUIKALAYI NE NSOMBELU WA BUENA KRISTO
Bua tshinyi tudi ne bua kutantamena ditshina dia bantu? Mmunyi mudi dielangana meji, disambila, ne dieyemena Yehowa bituambuluisha bua kuvudija dikima dia kudi Nzambi?
TUIKALAYI NE NSOMBELU WA BUENA KRISTO
Anu bu Abalahama, tudi ne bua kuleja ditabuja 
...
 nansha padibi bikole. Mmuntu mutudi bua kukolesha ditabuja ne lulamatu luetu?
BIUMA BIA MU DÎYI DIA NZAMBI
Tshikena kumona tshia ntempelo tshivua Yehezekele mumone tshidi tshituvuluija ne: Yehowa udi ne mikenji mitumbuke bua ntendelelu mukezuke. Tshidi mua kutusaka ku dienza tshinyi?
TUIKALAYI NE NSOMBELU WA BUENA KRISTO
Umue mushindu mutambe buimpe wa kufila wa kufila milambu ya kutumbisha nayi Nzambi nkulua mpanda-njila muambuluishi. Udiku mua kuenza pebe nanku bua kulengeja mudimu webe anyi?

“Mvua mulonde ne ntema yonso nsombelu wa kapia ka mu Tshilongelu tshia Ndongo tshia Mwanga tshia mu Kolwezi tshimvua ne diakalenga dia kukumbula matuku mashale aa. Ndi ne disanka dia bungi bua mumvua mumvue ku mbulamatadi ne: kakuena muntu udi ne bua kufua to. Tudi tusambila ne tuambuluisha bena mu mêku a balongi bavua bakenge, muanetu Jeannine Ilunga mulombodi wa tulasa ne bena mudimu bonso ba mu kalasa aku. Nzambi atukube! ” Tangila mukaji wa kumpala Denise Nyakeru mu dibeji diende dia Facebook.

Genese 3.1
Mpindyewu nyoka nguvwa mudimuke kupita nyama yônsò uvwa MUKALENGE Nzambi mufuke. Ke kwambilaye mukaji ne: Eyo, Nzambi mmwambe ne: Kanudi ku muci wônsò wa mu budimi anyi?
Genese 3.6-7
Nenku paakamona mukaji ne muci uvwa mwîmpè bwa kudya, ne uvwa wenza disanka ku mêsù, ne muci ukengela kujinga bwa kuvwija muntu ne lungenyi, yêyè wakangata cimuma cyawu, ne wakadya, ne wakapa pende bayende uvwa nende; ne yêyè wakadya.
Nenku mêsù abo bônsò babidi akatabala, ne baakamanya ne bavwa butaka; n
... 
 bwa kufikisha bukwabantu bwônsò ku didishinda?
Bu muvwabi ne Dimiinu dya mukaji divwa n’Nzambi mwikale udivudija Yêyè mwine anu byetu bya bushuwa ebi mu mubidi wa buntu, bya mwomumwe dimiinu dya nyoka mmushindu mwena dììnà wakapeta Sataana bwa kukumbana mwa kudyunzulwila ciibi bwa kubwela mu bukwabantu. ...

Ne Henoka kabidi, wa mwandamutekete kuumukila ku Adama, wakamba ciprofeta bwa bôbò abu, wamba ne: Monaayi, Mukalenge ulwalwa ne binunu dikumi bya bansantu bende.
